The Training Circle (G)
  As you head on further south through the encampment you come across the 
training fields of The Tribes. You see many of the Amazon practicing 
drills with weapons, combat formations and general physical to some new 
trainees. "You, there, what is your name?" She shouts. A muscular wolfen 
answers "Kallendbor M'am." "Attack me Kallendbor...NOW!" Shouts Lessandra.
Kallendbor leaps into the air with a ferocious strike that would rip a man in
half but Lessandra easily sidesteps and sends him spinning with one fluid 
motion. "You see students, it's not the size of your opponent that really 
matters, but what his current position own force against him. All because I 
knew where to move and more importantly how to move my opponent. Now go and 
do your daily line drills." Lessandra lectures. She then turns her gaze 
towards you and asks "How may I help you?" 

[ Exits: north south west ]
     (Magic) This fur is soft and hairy.
     It's just a dented can with some goo inside.
Lessandra, Amazon Champion, is here teaching the day's lesson.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3301/3413 HP  2109/3996 MP  2224/2229 mv  897tnl  
Lv 131  G 173204 | The Training Circle (NSW)
s
>>    
The Gates to the Ivory City
  Heading deeper into the jungle, your journey brings you to the
crumbling gates of some ancient structure.  Perhaps this is all that
remains of the rumored Ivory City, a relic of a culture long 
gone from the face of the world. A massive alabaster archway, 
covered in vines and crawling with insects, displays the remains 
of massive brass hinges.  The doors themselves are long gone, but here 
and there amidst the dirt and grime you see small chunks of ivory.  
There is an eerie sense of foreboding as you attempt to move further
south into the abandoned ruins.

[ Exits: north south ]

[*Daily Blessing*] 3301/3413 HP  2109/3996 MP  2224/2229 mv  897tnl  
Lv 131  G 173204 | The Gates to the Ivory City (NS)
s
>>    The Main Courtyard
  As you walk further into the ivory city you come across what was once the 
main courtyard. There is a large white marble fountain in the center, dry for
ages and cracked in several places. Pieces of marble benches and tarnished 
plaques honoring long dead heroes litter the place. Towards the side you see 
the bustle of several amazons, always the opportunists, they use the ruins as
a place to store their plunder. A tall amazonian woman who resembles Shilo 
in facial features is barking out orders to other tribesmen as they move 
about crates and packages, spoils from well placed ambushes in the jungle.
There are several corridors that lead off from this courtyard, but the only 
one that seems passable is to the south. 

[ Exits: north south ]
A tall amazon is here handing out equipment for the expedition.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3301/3413 HP  2109/3996 MP  2224/2229 mv  897tnl  
Lv 131  G 173204 | The Main Courtyard (NS)
s
>>    
Main Hallway
  You make your way into a large hallway of crumbling alabaster, its once 
white luster replaced by weather damage and dust. Several smaller hallways 
once branched from this one, but they have long since caved in or become some
jungle animals home. A group of Caboclos rummage through the debry looking 
for anything interesting, but finding mostly discarded and damaged trophies 
from a society long gone. The end of the hallway displays signs of once 
having a great gateway itself, but is now laid open for any who dare 
traverse deeper into the ruins. 

[ Exits: north south ]

[*Daily Blessing*] 3301/3413 HP  2109/3996 MP  2224/2229 mv  897tnl

>>    
list
Royal Court
  You come to a dead end, a vast chamber that once must have been 
some sort of throne room.  The soiled marble walls are cracked in
several places and there are scratch marks were looters pried the trim from the
walls, perhaps it was made of something precious.  On the far end there is a
marble dais that may have once contained a throne, though it appears
too large for just a single seat of power, and whatever was there has long
since rotted away.  Along the walls are statues of great 
importance, some broken and some whole. The plaques that bare their
names are slightly covered with years of wear and tear but all in all are still
readable.

[ Exits: north ]

>>    WHOOOOOOOOOOOOSH!
Boot Camp Headquarters (G)
  As you enter the Boot Camp Headquarters, you immediately notice that
the large main hall is adorned with feasting tables and fire pits
allowing the green recruits to relax after a hard days training.
A large mural on the northern wall depicts the founding members of the
Boot Camp standing before The Fallen Soldier on an ancient battlefield.
The other stone walls are decorated in the green and yellow insignia of
Boot Camp and various 'Boot Needs You' posters depicting an alluring Diva
dressed in the Boot Camp colours pointing at you.
From the arches leading out of the hall drift sounds of young recruits
being put through their paces and the smells of gunpowder and mud linger
in the air.

[ Exits: north east (south) west up down ]

  -  [held]    Held item to return after using portals  godkiller
  -  [spellup] Spellup to use                           napalm;spellup
  -  [hpot]    Health potion to use                     breakfast
  -  [mpot]    Mana potion to use                       moonlight
  -  [vpot]    Moves potion to use                      refreshing
  -  [pbag]    Potions bag                              backpack
  -  [portbag] Portals bag                              bag
  -  [bag]     General bag                              bag
  -  [attack1] Primary attack                           ca scorch
  -  [attack2] Secondary attack                         ca vamp
  -  [debuff1] First debuff                             ca poison
  -  [debuff2] Second debuff                            ca wither
  -  [cplvl]   Level to CP level until                  110
  -  [cpexp]   CP Level noexp toggle amount             700
  -  [group]   Group Frame Format until                 1
  -  [tdiff]   Time Difference from Mud Time            7
  -  [speak]   Speak audio alerts                       false

this was once a battlefield of the worthy and ruthless
but it has now been swept and turned into a training

Boot Clan Public Hall (G)
  You have wandered out of the Academy and into Boot Camps clanhall. 
Clans are a special thing on aardwolf allowing like minded people to 
come together. Read help clans for more information. Boot Camp is a 
clan designed to help new players learn more about the game and we 
enjoy doing it. Read help boot and help newbieclan to learn more. 
This area is not a part of the Academy and the first thing you should 
do on Aardwolf is complete the Academy goal. We offer newbie starter 
kits to all new players. If you would like one please send a member a 
tell. You can type who boot to see who is online. If they do not 
respond then they are most likely afk. All items in our newbie kits 
are also sold in this shop. Type list if you would like to take a look 
at them. To return to the Academy type north.

[ Exits: north east south west ]
A commissary shopkeeper stands here, begging you to type 'list'.

  You have entered a warehouse filled with military gear. Heaps of battered 
helmets and other miscellanea lay scattered randomly around the warehouse.

sneeze. As you make your way down the ragtag aisles you finally stumble upon

Courtyard (G)
  It stinks.  The smell of sweat, tears and broken spirits fills the air.
The sounds of soldiers in training have gotten much louder as you step
into the courtyard. "I don't know but I've been told, it's hard to run
with the weight of gold." You see soldiers everywhere running laps on
a beaten path around the courtyard. Some less-fortunate soldiers are lined
up doing pushups in the mud. In the center of the courtyard lay a finely 
manicured lawn and the Boot clan flag. To the north you notice the bunk 
house, to the west the General's quarters. Suddenly, an officer grabs you 
by the shoulder and shouts "What are you gawking around for, future
soldier? It's time you enlisted!" And with that he points you east to 
the enlisting office.

[ Exits: north east ]

Boot Camp Headquarters (G)
  As you enter the Boot Camp Headquarters, you immediately notice that
the large main hall is adorned with feasting tables and fire pits
allowing the green recruits to relax after a hard days training.
A large mural on the northern wall depicts the founding members of the
Boot Camp standing before The Fallen Soldier on an ancient battlefield.
The other stone walls are decorated in the green and yellow insignia of
Boot Camp and various 'Boot Needs You' posters depicting an alluring Diva
dressed in the Boot Camp colours pointing at you.
From the arches leading out of the hall drift sounds of young recruits
being put through their paces and the smells of gunpowder and mud linger
in the air.

[ Exits: north east (south) west up down ]

A Grumpy Old General stands here, shouting orders at the new recruits.

Boot Camp Headquarters (G)
  As you enter the Boot Camp Headquarters, you immediately notice that
the large main hall is adorned with feasting tables and fire pits
allowing the green recruits to relax after a hard days training.
A large mural on the northern wall depicts the founding members of the
Boot Camp standing before The Fallen Soldier on an ancient battlefield.
The other stone walls are decorated in the green and yellow insignia of
Boot Camp and various 'Boot Needs You' posters depicting an alluring Diva
dressed in the Boot Camp colours pointing at you.

being put through their paces and the smells of gunpowder and mud linger

Base of the Monolith
  You make your way through the small opening into a dark dank cave.  Small
lichens grow along the walls and you can hear the faint drip of water.  You
focus on the drips as your eyes adjust to the darkness.  Stalactites extend
down from the ceiling with rivulets of water coming off of them.  The drops
of water condense into pools along the bottom of the rounded walls.  In the
center of this cave a large monolith's base stands.  The monolith extends up
through the opening in the center of the cave.  A ladder seems to have been
carved into this massive monolith.  

[ Exits: north east south west up ]

The Monolith (G)
  As you make your way along the etched ladder you find yourself in an open
expanse.  The monolith somehow supports a large circular platform made from
rock that seems equidistant in all directions.  Twelve stones, each with a
strange marking, are evenly spaced in this circle.  The marks coincide with
deep markings etched on the monolith.  Well worn paths lead from the etched
markings on the monolith and the small stones surrounding it.

n
A Single Stone
  Moss and lichen seem to have overtaken the platform.  A narrow path leads
to a small ruby sunk into the platform.  The stone is set precisely halfway
from the monolith and the edge of the platform.  It seems almost magical as
no lichen or moss will grow on the paths.  Small disks are littered not far
from the ruby.  The disks have strange lettering on them.  Past the edge of
of the platform you can make out a swirling vision of an arena.

w
Outer edge of the Platform
  The platform reveals the flawlessness of a circle here.  The rounded edge
has no marks left on it as clues to how it was made.  Two gems are set deep
into the ground here.  One is a large bloodstone and the other is a smaller
amethyst.  Both have strange symbols carved deep into their facets.  A path
leads from the stones back to the central pillar.  Two swirling visions are
adrift inline with the bloodstone and amethyst.  Over the bloodstone is one
of an under sea vision.  By the amethyst is one of the great lake in Aylor.

Into The Murky Depths
  Heading down that tunnel might not have been a wise decision. The tunnel is 
too steep to climb back up, and the only way out now seems to be a thin trail
which is barely visible running south along the edge of a massive cliff. The 
unmistakable odor of smoke and sulfur drifts southwards on a nearly 
imperceptible current of air.

[ Exits: south ]

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3676/4086 MP  2002/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100000 | Into The Murky Depths (S)
>>    Boot Camp Headquarters (G)
  As you enter the Boot Camp Headquarters, you immediately notice that
the large main hall is adorned with feasting tables and fire pits
allowing the green recruits to relax after a hard days training.
A large mural on the northern wall depicts the founding members of the
Boot Camp standing before The Fallen Soldier on an ancient battlefield.
The other stone walls are decorated in the green and yellow insignia of
Boot Camp and various 'Boot Needs You' posters depicting an alluring Diva
dressed in the Boot Camp colours pointing at you.
From the arches leading out of the hall drift sounds of young recruits
being put through their paces and the smells of gunpowder and mud linger
in the air.

[ Exits: north east (south) west up down ]

The Grand City of Aylor (G)
  You stand on the edge of the beautiful City of Aylor.
 
A bright light shines down from the heavens, pouring over you, bathing you
in its warm glow.  Everything around you seems rich and pure in color.  An
enormous, white temple stands to the north, taking up most of your view.
 
To reach the Aylorian Academy, you must travel up the large staircase that
stands just off the side of the church.  (Type 'UP' to learn how to play the
game.)
 
Below you are large piles of armor and equipment discarded by other
adventurers.

Base of the Monolith
  You make your way through the small opening into a dark dank cave.  Small
lichens grow along the walls and you can hear the faint drip of water.  You
focus on the drips as your eyes adjust to the darkness.  Stalactites extend
down from the ceiling with rivulets of water coming off of them.  The drops
of water condense into pools along the bottom of the rounded walls.  In the
center of this cave a large monolith's base stands.  The monolith extends up
through the opening in the center of the cave.  A ladder seems to have been
carved into this massive monolith.  

[ Exits: north east south west up ]

enter bloodstone
"bloodstone"
You step into a Mysterious Bloodstone and arrive in...
Pristine Beach
  You stand on the edge of a familiar beach.  A lake before you is calm and
looks almost like a sheet of mirrored glass.  You see the occasional person
sunbathing or walking along the shoreline.  A lone tree grows in the center
of an island in the lake.  You believe you have seen this place before.  It
is Pristine Lake, from the city of Aylor.  But there is something odd about
it, a strangeness that tugs at the edge of your senses as you gaze over the
water.  Another look at the city you perceive to be Aylor immediately makes
you realize what's wrong.  The buildings are hazy and indistinct.  They may
just disappear like a dream if you were to look away.  A group of buildings
to the west seems especially out of place, you are quite sure that they did
not exist in the Aylor you know.  

A lake has formed from the liquid that has spilled from the container of
water that Aquarius holds. The water looks warm enough to swim in.

[ Exits: west other ]
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A woman holding a vessel of water gazes into the waters of the lake.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3730/4086 MP  2050/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100000 | Pristine Beach (W*)
>>    

You feel yourself slow down.

w
The University of Aylor
  You are in a grand courtyard, filled with throngs of young people milling 
around, talking, going from one place to another. All seem comfortable, in 
spite of the racial variety. Vampires share pleasant moments with sprites, 
Trolls walk next to elves. Judging by the architecture of the buildings in 
the distance, this is Aylor, but Aylor has never seen a place of such 
peaceful coexistence. As you shift your gaze, the majestic buildings at the 
edge of your vision fade into nothingness, replaced by shoddy wooden houses.
But a second look makes them appear solid again except for the lingering 
sense of unreality.

[ Exits: north east south ]
(Translucent) (Golden Aura) A cheerful student wanders the university grounds.
(Golden Aura) A lecturer looks over her notes for the day.
(Golden Aura) Trying to find that missing book, a librarian wanders around.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3730/4086 MP  2049/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100000 | The University of Aylor (NES)
>>    
s
A lecture hall
  The ground floor of this building appears to consist of a single circular
room.  The floor slopes downward, with rows of chairs and tables all turned
towards the center.  At the center is a raised stage with a lectern proudly
bearing the marking of the university.  As you move towards the center, you
feel as if the slightest noise can be heard clearly everywhere in the room. 
There is room for many listeners here, and it is clear by the marks of wear
on the chairs that the university makes good use of all the space.  

[ Exits: north ]

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3730/4086 MP  2048/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100000 | The University of Aylor (NES)
>>    A Library
  This library seems to stretch on forever.  Bookshelves surround the walls
almost every direction, all packed with books.  You see volumes on science,
religion, and philosophy.  It seems that all of the knowledge in the modern
world has been collected here.  You can almost hear the books whispering to
you.  However, as you focus on one of them, it appears indistinct, like you
could reach out to touch it and find nothing but emptiness.  Then suddenly,
it all becomes clear to you, none of the books have been written yet.  With
that thought comes a vague wrongness that makes you shiver, after it passes
you notice a stairway concealed behind an especially large bookcase.  

[ Exits: south down ]
(Translucent) (Golden Aura) A cheerful student wanders the university grounds.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3730/4086 MP  2047/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor)

d
The Dark Side of Aquarius [**> PK <**]
  This room is inexplicably alien in its normality, a simple basement, with
crumbling stone walls and a dirty floor.  Cobwebs decorate the dark corners
of the room, and you catch the occasional glimpse of vermin.  The stench of
disease and rot hang in the air, shadows move in disquieting ways along the
walls.  Above you is part of a great center of learning, but this place has
came straight out of a slum.  However, this basement has something that the
buildings above did not, it feels real.  It almost seems that nothing could
affect it, like it is beyond change.  

[ Exits: up ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A sparkling Diamond flares, nearly blinding you.
(White Aura) A child sits on the ground, staring upward sadly.

A lecture hall
  The ground floor of this building appears to consist of a single circular
room.  The floor slopes downward, with rows of chairs and tables all turned
towards the center.  At the center is a raised stage with a lectern proudly
bearing the marking of the university.  As you move towards the center, you
feel as if the slightest noise can be heard clearly everywhere in the room. 
There is room for many listeners here, and it is clear by the marks of wear
on the chairs that the university makes good use of all the space.  

[ Exits: north ]
(Golden Aura) Trying to find that missing book, a librarian wanders around.
(Translucent) (Golden Aura) A cheerful student wanders the university grounds.
(Translucent) (Golden Aura) A cheerful student wanders the university grounds.
(Golden Aura) A lecturer looks over her notes for the day.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3806/4086 MP  2052/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100000 | A lecture hall (N)

 North          : The University of Aylor 

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3806/4086 MP  2052/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100000 | A lecture hall (N)
>>    
n
The University of Aylor
  You are in a grand courtyard, filled with throngs of young people milling 
around, talking, going from one place to another. All seem comfortable, in 
spite of the racial variety. Vampires share pleasant moments with sprites, 
Trolls walk next to elves. Judging by the architecture of the buildings in 
the distance, this is Aylor, but Aylor has never seen a place of such 
peaceful coexistence. As you shift your gaze, the majestic buildings at the 
edge of your vision fade into nothingness, replaced by shoddy wooden houses.
But a second look makes them appear solid again except for the lingering 
sense of unreality.

[ Exits: north east south ]
(Translucent) (Golden Aura) A cheerful student wanders the university grounds.
(Golden Aura) A lecturer looks over her notes for the day.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3806/4086 MP  2052/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100000 | The University of Aylor (NES)
>>    
n
A Library
  This library seems to stretch on forever.  Bookshelves surround the walls
almost every direction, all packed with books.  You see volumes on science,
religion, and philosophy.  It seems that all of the knowledge in the modern
world has been collected here.  You can almost hear the books whispering to
you.  However, as you focus on one of them, it appears indistinct, like you
could reach out to touch it and find nothing but emptiness.  Then suddenly,
it all becomes clear to you, none of the books have been written yet.  With
that thought comes a vague wrongness that makes you shiver, after it passes
you notice a stairway concealed behind an especially large bookcase.  

[ Exits: south down ]
(Translucent) (Golden Aura) A cheerful student wanders the university grounds.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3806/4086 MP  2051/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100000 | A Library (SD)

The University of Aylor
  You are in a grand courtyard, filled with throngs of young people milling 
around, talking, going from one place to another. All seem comfortable, in 
spite of the racial variety. Vampires share pleasant moments with sprites, 
Trolls walk next to elves. Judging by the architecture of the buildings in 
the distance, this is Aylor, but Aylor has never seen a place of such 
peaceful coexistence. As you shift your gaze, the majestic buildings at the 
edge of your vision fade into nothingness, replaced by shoddy wooden houses.
But a second look makes them appear solid again except for the lingering 
sense of unreality.

[ Exits: north east south ]

(Golden Aura) A lecturer looks over her notes for the day.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3982/4086 MP  2053/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100000 | The University of Aylor (NES)
>>    Pristine Beach
  You stand on the edge of a familiar beach.  A lake before you is calm and
looks almost like a sheet of mirrored glass.  You see the occasional person
sunbathing or walking along the shoreline.  A lone tree grows in the center
of an island in the lake.  You believe you have seen this place before.  It
is Pristine Lake, from the city of Aylor.  But there is something odd about
it, a strangeness that tugs at the edge of your senses as you gaze over the
water.  Another look at the city you perceive to be Aylor immediately makes
you realize what's wrong.  The buildings are hazy and indistinct.  They may
just disappear like a dream if you were to look away.  A group of buildings
to the west seems especially out of place, you are quite sure that they did
not exist in the Aylor you know.  

A lake has formed from the liquid that has spilled from the container of
water that Aquarius holds. The water looks warm enough to swim in.

[ Exits: west other ]
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A woman holding a vessel of water gazes into the waters of the lake.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3982/4086 MP  2052/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100000 | Pristine Beach (W*)

Pristine Beach
  You stand on the edge of a familiar beach.  A lake before you is calm and
looks almost like a sheet of mirrored glass.  You see the occasional person
sunbathing or walking along the shoreline.  A lone tree grows in the center
of an island in the lake.  You believe you have seen this place before.  It
is Pristine Lake, from the city of Aylor.  But there is something odd about
it, a strangeness that tugs at the edge of your senses as you gaze over the
water.  Another look at the city you perceive to be Aylor immediately makes
you realize what's wrong.  The buildings are hazy and indistinct.  They may
just disappear like a dream if you were to look away.  A group of buildings
to the west seems especially out of place, you are quite sure that they did
not exist in the Aylor you know.

swim

------------------------------------------------------------
You jump into the lake, and swim away from the shore.
------------------------------------------------------------
In the Middle of the Lake
  This is in the middle of a clear blue lake. You can see the sandy shores all
around you, and you can even see the bottom of the lake. You can see several 
species of fish swimming in the distance, and there seems to be a smaller 
tentacled creature at the bottom of the lake. You can swim back to the shore,
or dive to see what is at the bottom of the lake.

[ Exits: other ]

dive

------------------------------------------------------------
You take a deep breath, and dive into the lake.

At the bottom of the lake
  You are at the bottom of a small lake. There is no current here, so you can 
see quite a distance in any direction. The floor of the lake is smooth and 
sandy, and enough light filters through the clear water to give an excellent 
visibility.

Pristine Beach
  You stand on the edge of a familiar beach.  A lake before you is calm and
looks almost like a sheet of mirrored glass.  You see the occasional person
sunbathing or walking along the shoreline.  A lone tree grows in the center
of an island in the lake.  You believe you have seen this place before.  It
is Pristine Lake, from the city of Aylor.  But there is something odd about
it, a strangeness that tugs at the edge of your senses as you gaze over the
water.  Another look at the city you perceive to be Aylor immediately makes

just disappear like a dream if you were to look away.  A group of buildings
to the west seems especially out of place, you are quite sure that they did
not exist in the Aylor you know.

Enter the command to move to the portal destination
swim

------------------------------------------------------------
You jump into the water and swim to shore.
------------------------------------------------------------
Pristine Beach
  You stand on the edge of a familiar beach.  A lake before you is calm and
looks almost like a sheet of mirrored glass.  You see the occasional person
sunbathing or walking along the shoreline.  A lone tree grows in the center
of an island in the lake.  You believe you have seen this place before.  It
is Pristine Lake, from the city of Aylor.  But there is something odd about
it, a strangeness that tugs at the edge of your senses as you gaze over the
water.  Another look at the city you perceive to be Aylor immediately makes
you realize what's wrong.  The buildings are hazy and indistinct.  They may
just disappear like a dream if you were to look away.  A group of buildings
to the west seems especially out of place, you are quite sure that they did
not exist in the Aylor you know.  

A lake has formed from the liquid that has spilled from the container of
water that Aquarius holds. The water looks warm enough to swim in.

[ Exits: west other ]
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A woman holding a vessel of water gazes into the waters of the lake.

  This is in the middle of a clear blue lake. You can see the sandy shores all

tentacled creature at the bottom of the lake. You can swim back to the shore,

  You are at the bottom of a small lake. There is no current here, so you can

In the Middle of the Lake
  This is in the middle of a clear blue lake. You can see the sandy shores all
around you, and you can even see the bottom of the lake. You can see several

Lv 131  G 100000 | In the Middle of the Lake (*)
>>    
------------------------------------------------------------
You jump into the water and swim to shore.
------------------------------------------------------------
Pristine Beach
  You stand on the edge of a familiar beach.  A lake before you is calm and
looks almost like a sheet of mirrored glass.  You see the occasional person
sunbathing or walking along the shoreline.  A lone tree grows in the center
of an island in the lake.  You believe you have seen this place before.  It
is Pristine Lake, from the city of Aylor.  But there is something odd about
it, a strangeness that tugs at the edge of your senses as you gaze over the
water.  Another look at the city you perceive to be Aylor immediately makes
you realize what's wrong.  The buildings are hazy and indistinct.  They may
just disappear like a dream if you were to look away.  A group of buildings
to the west seems especially out of place, you are quite sure that they did
not exist in the Aylor you know.  

A lake has formed from the liquid that has spilled from the container of
water that Aquarius holds. The water looks warm enough to swim in.

[ Exits: west other ]
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A woman holding a vessel of water gazes into the waters of the lake.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2054/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100000 | Pristine Beach (W*)
>>    The University of Aylor
  You are in a grand courtyard, filled with throngs of young people milling 
around, talking, going from one place to another. All seem comfortable, in 
spite of the racial variety. Vampires share pleasant moments with sprites, 
Trolls walk next to elves. Judging by the architecture of the buildings in 
the distance, this is Aylor, but Aylor has never seen a place of such 
peaceful coexistence. As you shift your gaze, the majestic buildings at the 
edge of your vision fade into nothingness, replaced by shoddy wooden houses.
But a second look makes them appear solid again except for the lingering 
sense of unreality.

[ Exits: north east south ]
(Translucent) (Golden Aura) A cheerful student wanders the university grounds.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2053/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor)

run nd
A Library (2052)

The Dark Side of Aquarius [**> PK <**]
  This room is inexplicably alien in its normality, a simple basement, with
crumbling stone walls and a dirty floor.  Cobwebs decorate the dark corners
of the room, and you catch the occasional glimpse of vermin.  The stench of
disease and rot hang in the air, shadows move in disquieting ways along the
walls.  Above you is part of a great center of learning, but this place has
came straight out of a slum.  However, this basement has something that the
buildings above did not, it feels real.  It almost seems that nothing could
affect it, like it is beyond change.  

[ Exits: up ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A sparkling Diamond flares, nearly blinding you.

You step into a Sparkling Diamond and arrive in...
Peak of the Monolith
  You have reached the peak of the monolith.  There does not seem to be any
air moving around this peak.  As you peer out upon the platform you see the
perfection of the circle and the placement of the markers below.  From this
vantage you can see past the platform.  Fuzzy images seem to be in line
with both the monolith etchings and the stone markers.  A peculiar smell of
brimstone and fresh rain seems to emanate from the monolith itself.

The Monolith (G)
  As you make your way along the etched ladder you find yourself in an open
expanse.  The monolith somehow supports a large circular platform made from
rock that seems equidistant in all directions.  Twelve stones, each with a
strange marking, are evenly spaced in this circle.  The marks coincide with
deep markings etched on the monolith.  Well worn paths lead from the etched
markings on the monolith and the small stones surrounding it.

of the platform you can make out a swirling vision of an arena.

You step into a Small Amethyst and arrive in...
Edge of the pond
  You step through the Amethyst to find yourself at the edge of a huge pond
surrounded by lush greenery.  Large trees and bushes snuggle up to the edge
of the water, several of the branches dip down to gently touch the surface. 
Small animals scurry about the ground, and throughout the foliage.  The air
is comfortably warm and the sound of the forest is pleasant.  Water laps at
the edge, cool and inviting.

Into the pond

Deep under the Water (2046)

The deep end
  The water is definitely cooler here.  You look down into darkening depths
that possibly harbor larger, more predatory fish.  Having discovered before
that you taste nasty, the fish avoid you.  The light from above shimmers on
the surface of the water and a green glow intensifies below.  Growing under
the water, plants sway around the edge of the pond.

You step into a Sparkling Diamond and arrive in...
Peak of the Monolith
  You have reached the peak of the monolith.  There does not seem to be any
air moving around this peak.  As you peer out upon the platform you see the
perfection of the circle and the placement of the markers below.  From this
vantage you can see past the platform.  Fuzzy images seem to be in line
with both the monolith etchings and the stone markers.  A peculiar smell of
brimstone and fresh rain seems to emanate from the monolith itself.

d
The Monolith (G)
  As you make your way along the etched ladder you find yourself in an open
expanse.  The monolith somehow supports a large circular platform made from
rock that seems equidistant in all directions.  Twelve stones, each with a
strange marking, are evenly spaced in this circle.  The marks coincide with
deep markings etched on the monolith.  Well worn paths lead from the etched
markings on the monolith and the small stones surrounding it.

The Monolith (G) (2053)

A Single Stone (2052)

Outer edge of the Platform
  The platform reveals the flawlessness of a circle here.  The rounded edge
has no marks left on it as clues to how it was made.  Two gems are set deep
into the ground here.  One is a large bloodstone and the other is a smaller
amethyst.  Both have strange symbols carved deep into their facets.  A path
leads from the stones back to the central pillar.  Two swirling visions are
adrift inline with the bloodstone and amethyst.  Over the bloodstone is one
of an under sea vision.  By the amethyst is one of the great lake in Aylor. 

[ Exits: east south ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A small Amethyst set in the ground with an odd sign.

>>    You step into a Small Amethyst and arrive in...
Edge of the pond
  You step through the Amethyst to find yourself at the edge of a huge pond
surrounded by lush greenery.  Large trees and bushes snuggle up to the edge
of the water, several of the branches dip down to gently touch the surface. 
Small animals scurry about the ground, and throughout the foliage.  The air
is comfortably warm and the sound of the forest is pleasant.  Water laps at
the edge, cool and inviting.

A Single Stone
  Moss and lichen seem to have overtaken the platform.  A narrow path leads
to a small ruby sunk into the platform.  The stone is set precisely halfway
from the monolith and the edge of the platform.  It seems almost magical as
no lichen or moss will grow on the paths.  Small disks are littered not far
from the ruby.  The disks have strange lettering on them.  Past the edge of
of the platform you can make out a swirling vision of an arena.

Sandy Section (G)
  This part of the platform has been covered with very fine sand.  No trace
of footsteps can be seen in the fine sand.  As you move over it a crunching
sound follows you.  As you move along the sand seems to move with you which
reveals two small stones set in the platform.  One is an enormous pearl and
the other is a finely etched sapphire.  Odd symbols were carved in of these
to match all the others in the circular platform.  Out past the edge of the
platform two swirling vision sit.  One is of a great arena, the other seems
to be two twins arguing with each other.  

[ Exits: south west ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A faceted Sapphire set in the ground with an odd sign.
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) An enormous Pearl set in the ground with an odd sign.
An unbeliever makes his way around the pillar, cursing it.
(Translucent) (Red Aura) A ghostly worshipper praises the pillar.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2048/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100000 | Sandy Section (SW)
>>    
s
Lichen Expanse (G)
  The moss seems to not be able to make any headway here.  Lichen has taken
over every square inch of this portion of the platform.  Oddly it all has a
silver color.  It seems to shimmer and shine under the faint light from the
stars.  A small emerald stone stands out amongst this field of silver.  The
path leading from the pillar towards the stone seems to be oddly colored as
well.  Not the same as that of the platform, but the color of moonstones, a
pale shimmering blue.  A swirling portal sits showing the murky scenes of a
small glade and calming pool.  

[ Exits: north south west ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A polished Emerald set in the ground with an odd sign.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2046/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100000 | Lichen Expanse (NSW)
>>    
enter emerald
"emerald"
You step into a Polished Emerald and arrive in...
Entrance to Cancer
  You are in the midst of a old forest with sturdy, thick-trunked trees and
little in the way of undergrowth.  A gentle wind stirs the leaves, creating
a whisper of sound that dances about your ears.  The rich smell of the loam
covering the ground surrounds you and your eyes are assaulted by the legion
of colorful flowers found tucked in crevices and on vines draped around the
trees.  Glancing about, you notice a worn path leading off further into the
forest.  

[ Exits: east ]
(Invis) (Golden Aura) (White Aura) A shy sprite is glimpsed occasionally, winking in and out of
view.
(White Aura) A priestess of the moon goddess performs the ceremonies.
(Invis) (Golden Aura) (White Aura) A shy sprite is glimpsed occasionally, winking in and out of
view.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2046/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100000 | Entrance to Cancer (E)
>>    
e
Path through the Forest
  This path seems to wander aimlessly.  The forest around you seems to glow
with the now muted light coming through the trees.  Charming flowers appear
in unlikely places, emanating scents that please and intrigue.  The whisper
of a breeze is augmented now by small voices adding their light chatter and
soft songs to the gentle symphony of sound.  After wandering for a bit, the
path suddenly ends at a clearing.  

[ Exits: east west ]
(Golden Aura) A lithe elf of the forest darts here and there.
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A handmaiden serves the goddess, seeing to the needs of the priestesses.
(White Aura) A priestess of the moon goddess performs the ceremonies.
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) The guardian of the glade stands ready to defend the priestesses.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2045/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100000 | Path through the Forest (EW)
>>    
e
Glade of Offering
  The forest spreads around a large open space.  The ground is covered with
soft grass and several colorful flowers.  The air is fragrant and sounds of
whispering are stronger now.  In the center of the glade lies a small stone
table nearly obscured with offerings piled upon and around it, offerings to
the Moon goddess who protects this place and all who dwell here.  The glade
seems to slope slightly down in all directions.  You also notice a glint of
light upon water just beyond the borders of the glade.  

[ Exits: south west ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A long slender staff lies here [5/5]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A long thick stick sits here, engraved is the words Speedy Delivery. 
[5/5]

Lv 131  G 100000 | Glade of Offering (SW)
>>    
s
Pool of Cleansing
  As you step into the cool pool of water it seems you have entered another
dimension.  Your cares drop away and the world seems a better place than it
was before.  Blessed by the Moon goddess, this water seems to have mystical
properties, endowed to those who inhabit this land.  Proceeding through the
shallow pool you hear the faint sound of water splashing getting louder and
louder.  You look up to see a waterfall descending from far above the pool. 
Looking down, you notice a light that seems to originate from behind it.  

[ Exits: north south ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A clear blue pool shimmers on the ground.
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) The guardian of the glade stands ready to defend the priestesses.

s
A Stone Ledge
  Making your way through the splashing water, you come across a wide stone
ledge.  The walls glow with light as it surrounds you.  You hear the sounds
of singing.  A niche in the wall holds a small alabaster statue of the Moon
goddess.  Created by the denizens here but blessed by the goddess, it gives
tangible evidence of her presence here and reassures her endless protection
and care.  

[ Exits: north ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A sparkling Diamond flares, nearly blinding you.
(Golden Aura) A lithe elf of the forest darts here and there.

view.

 to get the key to get there. Unfortunately, that traitorous squid Vamari

 retrieving them!"

 goes to a prison room near Aphrodite."

enter portal
"portal"
You step into forest green portal and arrive in...
Pool of Cleansing
  As you step into the cool pool of water it seems you have entered another
dimension.  Your cares drop away and the world seems a better place than it
was before.  Blessed by the Moon goddess, this water seems to have mystical
properties, endowed to those who inhabit this land.  Proceeding through the
shallow pool you hear the faint sound of water splashing getting louder and
louder.  You look up to see a waterfall descending from far above the pool. 
Looking down, you notice a light that seems to originate from behind it.  

[ Exits: north south ]

Glade of Offering
  The forest spreads around a large open space.  The ground is covered with
soft grass and several colorful flowers.  The air is fragrant and sounds of

table nearly obscured with offerings piled upon and around it, offerings to
the Moon goddess who protects this place and all who dwell here.  The glade
seems to slope slightly down in all directions.  You also notice a glint of
light upon water just beyond the borders of the glade.

w
Path through the Forest
  This path seems to wander aimlessly.  The forest around you seems to glow
with the now muted light coming through the trees.  Charming flowers appear
in unlikely places, emanating scents that please and intrigue.  The whisper
of a breeze is augmented now by small voices adding their light chatter and
soft songs to the gentle symphony of sound.  After wandering for a bit, the
path suddenly ends at a clearing.

Entrance to Cancer
  You are in the midst of a old forest with sturdy, thick-trunked trees and

covering the ground surrounds you and your eyes are assaulted by the legion

trees.  Glancing about, you notice a worn path leading off further into the
forest.

Peak of the Monolith
  You have reached the peak of the monolith.  There does not seem to be any

vantage you can see past the platform.  Fuzzy images seem to be in line
with both the monolith etchings and the stone markers.  A peculiar smell of
brimstone and fresh rain seems to emanate from the monolith itself.

The Monolith (G) (2040)

A Single Stone
  Moss and lichen seem to have overtaken the platform.  A narrow path leads
to a small ruby sunk into the platform.  The stone is set precisely halfway
from the monolith and the edge of the platform.  It seems almost magical as
no lichen or moss will grow on the paths.  Small disks are littered not far
from the ruby.  The disks have strange lettering on them.  Past the edge of
of the platform you can make out a swirling vision of an arena.  

[ Exits: east south west ]

e
Sandy Section (G)
  This part of the platform has been covered with very fine sand.  No trace
of footsteps can be seen in the fine sand.  As you move over it a crunching
sound follows you.  As you move along the sand seems to move with you which
reveals two small stones set in the platform.  One is an enormous pearl and
the other is a finely etched sapphire.  Odd symbols were carved in of these
to match all the others in the circular platform.  Out past the edge of the
platform two swirling vision sit.  One is of a great arena, the other seems
to be two twins arguing with each other.

>>    
"enter bloodstone;swim;dive;"
enter bloodstone;swim;dive;
You step into a Mysterious Bloodstone and arrive in...
Pristine Beach
  You stand on the edge of a familiar beach.  A lake before you is calm and
looks almost like a sheet of mirrored glass.  You see the occasional person
sunbathing or walking along the shoreline.  A lone tree grows in the center
of an island in the lake.  You believe you have seen this place before.  It
is Pristine Lake, from the city of Aylor.  But there is something odd about
it, a strangeness that tugs at the edge of your senses as you gaze over the
water.  Another look at the city you perceive to be Aylor immediately makes
you realize what's wrong.  The buildings are hazy and indistinct.  They may
just disappear like a dream if you were to look away.  A group of buildings
to the west seems especially out of place, you are quite sure that they did
not exist in the Aylor you know.  

A lake has formed from the liquid that has spilled from the container of
water that Aquarius holds. The water looks warm enough to swim in.

[ Exits: west other ]
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A woman holding a vessel of water gazes into the waters of the lake.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2048/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100000 | Pristine Beach (W*)
>>    
------------------------------------------------------------
You jump into the lake, and swim away from the shore.
------------------------------------------------------------
In the Middle of the Lake
  This is in the middle of a clear blue lake. You can see the sandy shores all
around you, and you can even see the bottom of the lake. You can see several 
species of fish swimming in the distance, and there seems to be a smaller 
tentacled creature at the bottom of the lake. You can swim back to the shore,
or dive to see what is at the bottom of the lake.

[ Exits: other ]

You take a deep breath, and dive into the lake.

At the bottom of the lake
  You are at the bottom of a small lake. There is no current here, so you can 
see quite a distance in any direction. The floor of the lake is smooth and 
sandy, and enough light filters through the clear water to give an excellent 
visibility.

In the Middle of the Lake
  This is in the middle of a clear blue lake. You can see the sandy shores all
around you, and you can even see the bottom of the lake. You can see several 
species of fish swimming in the distance, and there seems to be a smaller 
tentacled creature at the bottom of the lake. You can swim back to the shore,

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2054/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100014 | In the Middle of the Lake (*)
>>    
------------------------------------------------------------
You jump into the water and swim to shore.
------------------------------------------------------------
Pristine Beach
  You stand on the edge of a familiar beach.  A lake before you is calm and
looks almost like a sheet of mirrored glass.  You see the occasional person
sunbathing or walking along the shoreline.  A lone tree grows in the center
of an island in the lake.  You believe you have seen this place before.  It
is Pristine Lake, from the city of Aylor.  But there is something odd about
it, a strangeness that tugs at the edge of your senses as you gaze over the
water.  Another look at the city you perceive to be Aylor immediately makes
you realize what's wrong.  The buildings are hazy and indistinct.  They may
just disappear like a dream if you were to look away.  A group of buildings
to the west seems especially out of place, you are quite sure that they did
not exist in the Aylor you know.  

A lake has formed from the liquid that has spilled from the container of
water that Aquarius holds. The water looks warm enough to swim in.

[ Exits: west other ]
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A woman holding a vessel of water gazes into the waters of the lake.

>>    The University of Aylor (2053)

A Library (2052)

The Dark Side of Aquarius [**> PK <**]
  This room is inexplicably alien in its normality, a simple basement, with
crumbling stone walls and a dirty floor.  Cobwebs decorate the dark corners
of the room, and you catch the occasional glimpse of vermin.  The stench of
disease and rot hang in the air, shadows move in disquieting ways along the
walls.  Above you is part of a great center of learning, but this place has
came straight out of a slum.  However, this basement has something that the
buildings above did not, it feels real.  It almost seems that nothing could
affect it, like it is beyond change.  

[ Exits: up ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A sparkling Diamond flares, nearly blinding you.

A Single Stone (2050)

Outer edge of the Platform

Sandy Section (G)
  This part of the platform has been covered with very fine sand.  No trace
of footsteps can be seen in the fine sand.  As you move over it a crunching

to be two twins arguing with each other.

You step into a Faceted Sapphire and arrive in...
Entrance to Taurus
  A huge arch soars above you framing a tunnel fading into the gloom.  This
is the entrance to the bullfight arena and the sounds from within swell and
recede as the fight proceeds.  The air is comfortable, and the aroma coming
from the vendors' carts is enticing.  You move through an arch into a large
tunnel where it is cool and, for the moment, quiet.  

[ Exits: north ]
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A spectator wends his way, looking for his seat.
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A food vendor calls out his offerings.
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A spectator wends his way, looking for his seat.
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A ridiculous-looking man moves about, watching for trouble.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2054/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100032 | Entrance to Taurus (N)
>>    
n
Upper Stands
  Leaving the tunnel, shouting and excited screams assault your ears as the
fight below reaches a frenzy of activity.  You look around and see that you
made a comfortable choice of seat.  Your gaze is captivated by the scene on
the arena floor.  The bullfighter is just preparing to deliver the coup.  A
gasp from the crowd is heard as the sword is driven into the bull's neck.  

[ Exits: east south ]
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A food vendor calls out his offerings.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2053/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100032 | Upper Stands (ES)
e
>>    Ringside Stands
  The view from the lower seats is amazing.  Your seat is close to the edge
and you settle in to watch the remainder of the fights.  Vendors holler out
their offerings, the smells promise delicious rewards.  Down below, another
fight begins, the teasers begin prodding the bull into the arena.  Stepping
out from behind a protective wall, a bullfighter begins his dangerous dance
with death.  

[ Exits: west down ]
(Golden Aura) A stunningly beautiful woman stands here cheering from the the stands.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2052/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100032 | Ringside Stands (WD)
>>    
d
Behind the Wall
  Bullfighters gather here waiting for their turn in the arena.  The clowns
watch from behind the wall, ever ready to dash out and distract a rampaging
bull.  The tension is palpable, no bullfighter wants to see a friend gored,
but the possibility is an ever-present threat.  Each walks about, nervously
swiping his cape back and forth.  "What will happen to me today", he asks.  

[ Exits: north up (down) ]
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A spectator wends his way, looking for his seat.
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A ridiculous-looking man moves about, watching for trouble.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2051/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100032 | Behind the Wall (NU[D])
>>    


n
Center of the Arena
  Sweat rains down from the faces of the bullfighter and the clowns as they
dance about, teasing and chasing the bull.  The bullfighter waves his cape,
then turns gracefully to avoid the horns of the bull.  This dance continues
until the bull, wounded and enraged, turns to charge the bullfighter.  Then
he raises his sword and thrusts it deep into the animal's neck, watching as
the enormous beast falls to his knees in death.  Cheers erupt from above in
the stands and the bullfighter turns to bow to the audience.  

[ Exits: south ]

Behind the Wall
  Bullfighters gather here waiting for their turn in the arena.  The clowns
watch from behind the wall, ever ready to dash out and distract a rampaging
bull.  The tension is palpable, no bullfighter wants to see a friend gored,
but the possibility is an ever-present threat.  Each walks about, nervously
swiping his cape back and forth.  "What will happen to me today", he asks.  

[ Exits: north up (down) ]
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A spectator wends his way, looking for his seat.
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A ridiculous-looking man moves about, watching for trouble.

Behind the Wall
  Bullfighters gather here waiting for their turn in the arena.  The clowns
watch from behind the wall, ever ready to dash out and distract a rampaging
bull.  The tension is palpable, no bullfighter wants to see a friend gored,
but the possibility is an ever-present threat.  Each walks about, nervously
swiping his cape back and forth.  "What will happen to me today", he asks.

Lv 131  G 100055 | Behind the Wall (NUD)
>>    
n
Center of the Arena
  Sweat rains down from the faces of the bullfighter and the clowns as they
dance about, teasing and chasing the bull.  The bullfighter waves his cape,
then turns gracefully to avoid the horns of the bull.  This dance continues
until the bull, wounded and enraged, turns to charge the bullfighter.  Then
he raises his sword and thrusts it deep into the animal's neck, watching as
the enormous beast falls to his knees in death.  Cheers erupt from above in
the stands and the bullfighter turns to bow to the audience.  

[ Exits: south ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A sparkling Diamond flares, nearly blinding you.
(White Aura) The bull stands here, glaring at everyone.
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A colorful bullfighter struts about the arena.

You step into a Sparkling Diamond and arrive in...
Peak of the Monolith
  You have reached the peak of the monolith.  There does not seem to be any
air moving around this peak.  As you peer out upon the platform you see the
perfection of the circle and the placement of the markers below.  From this
vantage you can see past the platform.  Fuzzy images seem to be in line
with both the monolith etchings and the stone markers.  A peculiar smell of
brimstone and fresh rain seems to emanate from the monolith itself.  

[ Exits: (up) down ]
(Translucent) (Golden Aura) (White Aura) An old grey-haired man sits here staring up at the heavens.

d
The Monolith (G)
  As you make your way along the etched ladder you find yourself in an open
expanse.  The monolith somehow supports a large circular platform made from
rock that seems equidistant in all directions.  Twelve stones, each with a
strange marking, are evenly spaced in this circle.  The marks coincide with
deep markings etched on the monolith.  Well worn paths lead from the etched
markings on the monolith and the small stones surrounding it.  

[ Exits: north east south west up down ]
A strange man wearing a goat fur robe stands here scanning the area.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4071/4086 MP  2053/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100055 | The Monolith (NESWUD)
>>    
n
A Single Stone
  Moss and lichen seem to have overtaken the platform.  A narrow path leads
to a small ruby sunk into the platform.  The stone is set precisely halfway
from the monolith and the edge of the platform.  It seems almost magical as
no lichen or moss will grow on the paths.  Small disks are littered not far
from the ruby.  The disks have strange lettering on them.  Past the edge of
of the platform you can make out a swirling vision of an arena.  

[ Exits: east south west ]
     (Invis) (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A piece of the central pillar has broken off.
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A large Ruby set in the ground with an odd sign.
(Translucent) A ghostly priest wanders around here trying to convert all it meets.
(Translucent) A ghostly priest wanders around here trying to convert all it meets.
(Translucent) (Golden Aura) (White Aura) A ghostly queen proceeds over what was her lands,
lamenting.
(Translucent) (White Aura) A ghostly king moans before the pillar with great sadness.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4071/4086 MP  2052/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100055 | A Single Stone (ESW)
>>    
e
Sandy Section (G)
  This part of the platform has been covered with very fine sand.  No trace
of footsteps can be seen in the fine sand.  As you move over it a crunching
sound follows you.  As you move along the sand seems to move with you which
reveals two small stones set in the platform.  One is an enormous pearl and
the other is a finely etched sapphire.  Odd symbols were carved in of these
to match all the others in the circular platform.  Out past the edge of the
platform two swirling vision sit.  One is of a great arena, the other seems
to be two twins arguing with each other.  

[ Exits: south west ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A faceted Sapphire set in the ground with an odd sign.
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) An enormous Pearl set in the ground with an odd sign.
An unbeliever makes his way around the pillar, cursing it.
(Translucent) (Red Aura) A ghostly worshipper praises the pillar.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4071/4086 MP  2050/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100055 | Sandy Section (SW)
>>    
s
Lichen Expanse (G)
  The moss seems to not be able to make any headway here.  Lichen has taken
over every square inch of this portion of the platform.  Oddly it all has a
silver color.  It seems to shimmer and shine under the faint light from the
stars.  A small emerald stone stands out amongst this field of silver.  The
path leading from the pillar towards the stone seems to be oddly colored as
well.  Not the same as that of the platform, but the color of moonstones, a
pale shimmering blue.  A swirling portal sits showing the murky scenes of a
small glade and calming pool.  

[ Exits: north south west ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A polished Emerald set in the ground with an odd sign.
(Translucent) (Red Aura) A ghostly worshipper praises the pillar.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4071/4086 MP  2048/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100055 | Lichen Expanse (NSW)
>>    
s
Where the Moss Grows (G)
  The moss has entirely overgrown the path leading to the two stones set in
the ground here.  The moss has a kaleidoscopic color to it.  Odd for normal
green moss, but it seems as though the rainbow has flooded the moss of this
area creating odd designs and beauty amongst the floor here.  A large piece
of Onyx and Jade peek out from the kaleidoscope.  Strange symbols have been
etched into them.  In the distance, far away from the edge of the platform,
two swirling visions float.  One is of a fierce competition area, the other
of a simple temple.  

[ Exits: north west ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A perfect Onyx set in the ground with an odd sign.
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A deep Jade set in the ground with an odd sign.
(Translucent) (Red Aura) A ghost convert hovers here staring in wonder at the monolith.
An unbeliever makes his way around the pillar, cursing it.

You step into a Deep Jade and arrive in...
A Magnificent Courtyard
  Massive, marble columns support an extended roof at the front of the main
temple offering fair protection from the elements while allowing a sense of
openness and freedom.  The extensive courtyard hums with the daily activity
of the many visitors that frequent the temple grounds.  The stone walkways,
and grand central fountain shimmer in beauty and cleanliness, the result of
hard work in cleaning and caring for the area.  

[ Exits: south ]
     This magnificent fountain offers water to those traveling from afar.
(Red Aura) Running to find more trouble, this misbehaving child causes a lot of mischief.

s
Between the Pillars
  Intricate carving and master craftsmanship touch the white marble framing
the entryway of the temple.  A pair of smaller yet no less detailed pillars
stand to serve like a portal between the outside world and inner sanctuary. 
A sweet mixture of aromas ride on a light breeze from within, the scents of
spices, perfumes, and fruits intermingling to seduce one's sense of smell.  

[ Exits: north south ]

A misbehaving child arrives from the north.

s
The Pristine Vestibule
  Clear, crystal globes are set on ledges etched into the marble walls, the
carved blocks form a checkered pattern toward the west side of the room.  A
single, lit candle was placed in each orb the ensemble of flames flickering
light and shadows from the white, marble floor up to the top of the heights
of the cathedral ceiling.  Despite the regular traffic of mortality through
this place, everything about it remains flawless.  The temple's library lay
off to the south, and to the east is the Maiden's chamber.  

[ Exits: north east south ]
(Golden Aura) A well-dressed guard welcomes guests while keeping watch for any troublemakers.
(Golden Aura) A well-dressed guard welcomes guests while keeping watch for any troublemakers.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2052/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100055 | The Pristine Vestibule (NES)
>>    
s
The Maiden's Library
  Volumes of script, both of modern and ancient text, fill mahogany shelves
almost completely covering all walls in this room.  Desks and chairs of the
same wood and finish set about the library to offer those seeking knowledge
a place of comfort to conduct their studies.  A stained-glass window of the
Maiden herself has been set into the ceiling gives the room light necessary
to read.  Despite the large number of texts and visitors, neither a pile of
clutter nor a book out of place can be found.  

[ Exits: north ]
(White Aura) The temple's scribe works diligently to keep the library's texts in perfect order.
Dedicating their life to the temple, this attendant seeks to serve the Maiden in every way.

e
>>    The Maiden's Chambers
  Lavishly furnished in priceless art and beautiful decor, this room serves
as the Maiden's private chambers where she and her advisors conduct most of
their business and affairs.  Formal, yet quite comfortable sofas and chairs
have been arranged in a circular fashion and slant to face a large, soaring
cathedra.  Adequate spaced aisles of have been purposefully formed to allow
easy movement of the Lady's maids and attendants.  

[ Exits: west ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A sparkling Diamond flares, nearly blinding you.
     (Glow) Pillows have been placed neatly around to form a luxurious bed of comfort.

say second fragment
You say 'second fragment'
Virgo, the maiden says, "So you're looking for the second fragment? I know
 where to find it..Or used to..I seem to forget things..like my name.."
Virgo, the maiden sighs.
Virgo, the maiden says, "I'm sure I could remember where the second
 fragment is if I can remember my name, and no it's not Virgo."
Virgo, the maiden says, "Libra probably knows what my name is, so help me
 remember my name and I will tell you where to find the second fragment."

perfection of the circle and the placement of the markers below.  From this
vantage you can see past the platform.  Fuzzy images seem to be in line
with both the monolith etchings and the stone markers.  A peculiar smell of
brimstone and fresh rain seems to emanate from the monolith itself.  

[ Exits: (up) down ]
(Translucent) (Golden Aura) (White Aura) An old grey-haired man sits here staring up at the heavens.

d
The Monolith (G)
  As you make your way along the etched ladder you find yourself in an open
expanse.  The monolith somehow supports a large circular platform made from
rock that seems equidistant in all directions.  Twelve stones, each with a
strange marking, are evenly spaced in this circle.  The marks coincide with
deep markings etched on the monolith.  Well worn paths lead from the etched
markings on the monolith and the small stones surrounding it.  

[ Exits: north east south west up down ]
A strange man wearing a goat fur robe stands here scanning the area.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2051/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100055 | The Monolith (NESWUD)
>>    
w
West of the Pillar
  The platform stretches out to the edge from the central pillar.  Moss and
lichen grow here in a dark brown color.  A odd smell of wet goat comes from
this area.  It seems to emanate from the stone set into the ground with the
odd markings.  The stone appears to be a small garnet affixed firmly in the
ground.  The path from here to the central pillar seems to be slightly less
worn.  In the distance a swirling vision shows of a small valley.  

[ Exits: north east south ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A blood-red Garnet set in the ground with an odd sign.
(Translucent) (Red Aura) A ghostly worshipper praises the pillar.
(Translucent) (Red Aura) A ghostly worshipper praises the pillar.

s
Circling the Platform
  This portion of the platform seems to be the only spot which has any form
of noise to it.  The moss grow here in a deep maroon color, the lichen grow
crisscrossed with a vibrant shade of purple.  It almost seems like they are
trying to compete for the space of this section of the platform.  Two small
stones have been thrust into the ground.  One appears to be a richly veined
piece of turquoise, to which the lichen seem to grow from.  The other stone
is a light yellow piece of topaz.  The stones have odd carvings on them.  A
path from the pillar to these stones has been almost completely grown over. 

[ Exits: north east ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A veined Turquoise set in the ground with an odd sign.

e
In the shadow of the Pillar
  This room seems quite dark, no moss or lichen grow here.  A path from the
central pillar and the odd green stone set in the ground here has been worn
into the platform.  A silence seems to be all consuming in this area.  Even
the sound of footsteps are swallowed by this silence.  The stones to either
side seem to twinkle at you.  Off past the edge of the platform you can see
a chaotic swirling mass that shows images of a courtroom.  

[ Exits: north east west ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A gleaming Peridot set in the ground with an odd sign.
(Translucent) (Red Aura) A ghostly worshipper praises the pillar.

Global Quest: Global Quest # 5364 has been won by Tenebrous - 188th win.


enter peridot
"peridot"
You step into a Gleaming Peridot and arrive in...
Judge's Chambers
  You arrive to find yourself in a modest tight room.  Bookshelves line the
walls, each relating to separate topics of law and judicial findings of all
the lands.  A tiny desk is packed in tight near a window.  The window looks
out onto the stars and darkness surrounding them.  Near the door is a small
coat rack.  A set of robes hangs on the rack as well as a wig dyed in blue. 
A door to the south is made from heavy stone and sits slightly open looking
out onto the the judges bench beyond.  The air in the room smells stale and
old.  

[ Exits: south ]

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2046/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100055 | Judge's Chambers (S)
>>    


s
The Bench [**> PK <**]
  Passing through the open door you find yourself in front of a large stone
structure.  Steps lead up to a large platform with a table on it.  A mallet
rests on top of the platform.  As you move around this structure you notice
the front half is a smoothed cylinder with a set of scales etched deep into
the stone.  One side of the scales holds a large stack of gold bricks.  The
other side holds a set of mangled bodies.  The scale is perfectly balanced. 
Off to the side you can see a set of thirteen chairs.  In front is a fenced
off area with a random number of chairs here and there.  

[ Exits: north east south ]
     (Magic) (Glow) A gavel lies here going unused.
     (Invis) A blindfold lies crumbled on the floor.
(White Aura) A judge waddles his way about, blindfolded.
(White Aura) Libra, the symbol of balance and justice, stands here watching the trial.

e
[**> PK <**] >>    
The Jury Box [**> PK <**]
  This area seems very orderly.  There are seven steel chairs evenly spaced 
behind a set of wooden rails.  Behind them are six more, spaced in directly 
between the front seven.  Wooden rails are at floor level, the front row is on 
a slightly raised dais.  The back row is much higher then the first row.  As 
you make your way behind the rows of chairs, you see thick pads of paper stuck 
in both the wooden railing and the backs of the seven chairs.  All of the pads 
have a charcoal pencil placed next to them.  There is a wide space between the 
railing and the peanut gallery.

[ Exits: south west ]
(Golden Aura) A jury member listens intently.
(Golden Aura) A jury member listens intently.
(Golden Aura) A jury member listens intently.

The Monolith (G) (2053)

In the shadow of the Pillar (2052)

Where the Moss Grows (G)
  The moss has entirely overgrown the path leading to the two stones set in
the ground here.  The moss has a kaleidoscopic color to it.  Odd for normal
green moss, but it seems as though the rainbow has flooded the moss of this
area creating odd designs and beauty amongst the floor here.  A large piece
of Onyx and Jade peek out from the kaleidoscope.  Strange symbols have been
etched into them.  In the distance, far away from the edge of the platform,
two swirling visions float.  One is of a fierce competition area, the other
of a simple temple.  

[ Exits: north west ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A perfect Onyx set in the ground with an odd sign.
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A deep Jade set in the ground with an odd sign.

A Magnificent Courtyard
  Massive, marble columns support an extended roof at the front of the main
temple offering fair protection from the elements while allowing a sense of
openness and freedom.  The extensive courtyard hums with the daily activity
of the many visitors that frequent the temple grounds.  The stone walkways,
and grand central fountain shimmer in beauty and cleanliness, the result of
hard work in cleaning and caring for the area.

The Pristine Vestibule (2048)

The Maiden's Chambers
  Lavishly furnished in priceless art and beautiful decor, this room serves
as the Maiden's private chambers where she and her advisors conduct most of
their business and affairs.  Formal, yet quite comfortable sofas and chairs
have been arranged in a circular fashion and slant to face a large, soaring
cathedra.  Adequate spaced aisles of have been purposefully formed to allow
easy movement of the Lady's maids and attendants.

A Magnificent Courtyard
  Massive, marble columns support an extended roof at the front of the main
temple offering fair protection from the elements while allowing a sense of
openness and freedom.  The extensive courtyard hums with the daily activity
of the many visitors that frequent the temple grounds.  The stone walkways,

Between the Pillars (2049)

The Pristine Vestibule (2048)

The Maiden's Chambers
  Lavishly furnished in priceless art and beautiful decor, this room serves
as the Maiden's private chambers where she and her advisors conduct most of
their business and affairs.  Formal, yet quite comfortable sofas and chairs
have been arranged in a circular fashion and slant to face a large, soaring
cathedra.  Adequate spaced aisles of have been purposefully formed to allow
easy movement of the Lady's maids and attendants.

>>    You step into a Gleaming Peridot and arrive in...
Judge's Chambers
  You arrive to find yourself in a modest tight room.  Bookshelves line the
walls, each relating to separate topics of law and judicial findings of all
the lands.  A tiny desk is packed in tight near a window.  The window looks
out onto the stars and darkness surrounding them.  Near the door is a small
coat rack.  A set of robes hangs on the rack as well as a wig dyed in blue. 
A door to the south is made from heavy stone and sits slightly open looking
out onto the the judges bench beyond.  The air in the room smells stale and
old.

>>    The Bench [**> PK <**]
  Passing through the open door you find yourself in front of a large stone
structure.  Steps lead up to a large platform with a table on it.  A mallet
rests on top of the platform.  As you move around this structure you notice
the front half is a smoothed cylinder with a set of scales etched deep into
the stone.  One side of the scales holds a large stack of gold bricks.  The
other side holds a set of mangled bodies.  The scale is perfectly balanced. 
Off to the side you can see a set of thirteen chairs.  In front is a fenced
off area with a random number of chairs here and there.

The edge of a forest
  You are standing at the edge of a dark, ancient forest.  Thick pine trees

like a large animal recently forced its way into the forest.

At a strange pit
  Pushing your way through the bushes, you are forced to stop as the forest

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2049/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100086 | At a strange pit (NSD)
>>    
s
By a stream
  A crystal-clear brook makes its way through the tree trunks here, flowing
over grey and white pebbles licked smooth by centuries of water.  The sound
emanating from the forest is somewhat noisier here.  You catch the glimpses
of animals looking at you: squirrels, snakes, rabbits.  Obviously this is a
popular place for the area denizens to quench their thirst.  Not everything
is calm and peaceful.  A grey boulder lies beside the stream with a splotch
of dried blood is clearly visible on it.  What happened here?

Crotus says, "What?  Did you say something about the third fragment?  The
 noise in here is so terrible that it's hard to tell what you just said. It
 wouldn't be so bad if these muses could actually sing, but their music
 sounds more like wounded cats than actual music."

Crotus says, "Tell you what, get me some earplugs and I'll help you find
 the third fragment.  Rumor has it that the twins have some earplugs.
 Castor will be more likely to help you if you give him this."
Crotus says, "Just say snowball if you need another snowball."
You receive snowball from Crotus.

The edge of a forest
  You are standing at the edge of a dark, ancient forest.  Thick pine trees
obscure your vision and cast shadows everywhere, preventing you from seeing
much of anything more than about twenty feet away.  A blanket of calm sound
covers the entire area.  Birds are chirping and leaves rustle in the gentle
wind, almost nothing at all unusual.  The only thing strange here is that a
few of the bushes are damaged and the grass seems to be trampled in places,
like a large animal recently forced its way into the forest.

about.  As your eyes adjust to the new gloom down here you see an odd light
off to your side.  You see another opening that does not lead up toward the
surface.

enter pearl
"pearl"
You step into an Enormous Pearl and arrive in...
The Birth of Dios Kouroi
  You have never been in a room with two of everything.  Two chairs, tucked
against opposite sides of two tables.  Two windows, symmetrically equal, in
each wall, located exactly the same distance from each wall as the distance
from each other.  Two Eggs, recently hatched, the shells broken open at the
same points, each in the nest of a giant goose.  You look to your side, and
for a split second, could've sworn you saw an exact replica of yourself!  A
decorative card is placed on each table, no doubt with the same inscription
on either, left or right.  

[ Exits: other ]

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2035/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor)

l;ex
The Birth of Dios Kouroi
  You have never been in a room with two of everything.  Two chairs, tucked
against opposite sides of two tables.  Two windows, symmetrically equal, in
each wall, located exactly the same distance from each wall as the distance
from each other.  Two Eggs, recently hatched, the shells broken open at the
same points, each in the nest of a giant goose.  You look to your side, and
for a split second, could've sworn you saw an exact replica of yourself!  A
decorative card is placed on each table, no doubt with the same inscription
on either, left or right.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2054/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100086 | The Birth of Dios Kouroi (*)
>>    
Enter the command to move to the portal destination
right

------------------------------------------------------------
You close your right eye, and the room shifts, gaining clarity.
------------------------------------------------------------
A boxing match
  Musty sweat and the stench of dirty feet assault your nostrils.  Roars of
the enormous crowd rise to a near-deafening pitch.  From out of nowhere, as
though the crowd fell silent for a split second, thump, crack, thud.  Their
sudden silence brings about a swan song of ringing to your ears as they now
chant: "Polydeuces!"  "Polydeuces!"  "He's felled King Amycus!"  

[ Exits: north ]
(Red Aura) A man in the crowd is jeering the loss of his King.
(Golden Aura) A man in the crowd is cheering the victory of Polydeuces.
(Red Aura) A man in the crowd is jeering the loss of his King.
(Red Aura) A man in the crowd is jeering the loss of his King.

(Red Aura) A man in the crowd is jeering the loss of his King.

The Pits of Hades (G)
  Forced to labor for eternity, the souls of the dead shuffle by, unwilling
or unable to take notice of you.  Demons patrol the line of working stiffs,
looking for anyone slacking, they give you a leery eye before moving on.  A
line of the damned bringing forth buckets of magma to fuel volcanoes string
off out in the distance.  A tablet floats here, it seems to be oddly out of
place, where flames growing randomly from the floor seem to have not left a
mark, whereas the walls and occupants are all well-scorched.

The Monolith (G)
  As you make your way along the etched ladder you find yourself in an open
expanse.  The monolith somehow supports a large circular platform made from
rock that seems equidistant in all directions.  Twelve stones, each with a
strange marking, are evenly spaced in this circle.  The marks coincide with
deep markings etched on the monolith.  Well worn paths lead from the etched
markings on the monolith and the small stones surrounding it.  

[ Exits: north east south west up down ]
(Translucent) (Red Aura) A ghostly worshipper praises the pillar.
A strange man wearing a goat fur robe stands here scanning the area.
