s
>>    In the shadow of the Pillar
  This room seems quite dark, no moss or lichen grow here.  A path from the
central pillar and the odd green stone set in the ground here has been worn
into the platform.  A silence seems to be all consuming in this area.  Even
the sound of footsteps are swallowed by this silence.  The stones to either
side seem to twinkle at you.  Off past the edge of the platform you can see
a chaotic swirling mass that shows images of a courtroom.

Where the Moss Grows (G)

etched into them.  In the distance, far away from the edge of the platform,
two swirling visions float.  One is of a fierce competition area, the other
of a simple temple.

Circling the Platform
  This portion of the platform seems to be the only spot which has any form
of noise to it.  The moss grow here in a deep maroon color, the lichen grow

"enter Turquoise;"

You step into a Veined Turquoise and arrive in...
The edge of a forest
  You are standing at the edge of a dark, ancient forest.  Thick pine trees
obscure your vision and cast shadows everywhere, preventing you from seeing
much of anything more than about twenty feet away.  A blanket of calm sound
covers the entire area.  Birds are chirping and leaves rustle in the gentle
wind, almost nothing at all unusual.  The only thing strange here is that a
few of the bushes are damaged and the grass seems to be trampled in places,
like a large animal recently forced its way into the forest.  

[ Exits: south ]

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2046/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor)

s
At a strange pit
  Pushing your way through the bushes, you are forced to stop as the forest
floor disappears suddenly before you.  The thick foliage mysteriously gives
way to a massive black hole in the ground.  The hole seems quite deep, with
a light wind blowing from it and several tiny motes of dust floating in the
air above.  Huge animal tracks are visible here too, leading around the pit
from the north to the south.

off to your side.  You see another opening that does not lead up toward the
surface.

e
Where the Moss Grows (G)
  The moss has entirely overgrown the path leading to the two stones set in
the ground here.  The moss has a kaleidoscopic color to it.  Odd for normal
green moss, but it seems as though the rainbow has flooded the moss of this
area creating odd designs and beauty amongst the floor here.  A large piece
of Onyx and Jade peek out from the kaleidoscope.  Strange symbols have been
etched into them.  In the distance, far away from the edge of the platform,
two swirling visions float.  One is of a fierce competition area, the other
of a simple temple.  

[ Exits: north west ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A perfect Onyx set in the ground with an odd sign.
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A deep Jade set in the ground with an odd sign.

n
Lichen Expanse (G)
  The moss seems to not be able to make any headway here.  Lichen has taken
over every square inch of this portion of the platform.  Oddly it all has a
silver color.  It seems to shimmer and shine under the faint light from the
stars.  A small emerald stone stands out amongst this field of silver.  The
path leading from the pillar towards the stone seems to be oddly colored as
well.  Not the same as that of the platform, but the color of moonstones, a
pale shimmering blue.  A swirling portal sits showing the murky scenes of a
small glade and calming pool.  

[ Exits: north south west ]

n

The sky, ever-turning, aligns the Zodiac to illuminate your path.

Sandy Section (G)
  This part of the platform has been covered with very fine sand.  No trace
of footsteps can be seen in the fine sand.  As you move over it a crunching
sound follows you.  As you move along the sand seems to move with you which
reveals two small stones set in the platform.  One is an enormous pearl and
the other is a finely etched sapphire.  Odd symbols were carved in of these
to match all the others in the circular platform.  Out past the edge of the
platform two swirling vision sit.  One is of a great arena, the other seems
to be two twins arguing with each other.  

[ Exits: south west ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A faceted Sapphire set in the ground with an odd sign.
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) An enormous Pearl set in the ground with an odd sign.

An unbeliever makes his way around the pillar, cursing it.

w
A Single Stone
  Moss and lichen seem to have overtaken the platform.  A narrow path leads
to a small ruby sunk into the platform.  The stone is set precisely halfway
from the monolith and the edge of the platform.  It seems almost magical as
no lichen or moss will grow on the paths.  Small disks are littered not far
from the ruby.  The disks have strange lettering on them.  Past the edge of
of the platform you can make out a swirling vision of an arena.  

[ Exits: east south west ]
     (Invis) (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A piece of the central pillar has broken off.

Outer edge of the Platform
  The platform reveals the flawlessness of a circle here.  The rounded edge
has no marks left on it as clues to how it was made.  Two gems are set deep
into the ground here.  One is a large bloodstone and the other is a smaller
amethyst.  Both have strange symbols carved deep into their facets.  A path
leads from the stones back to the central pillar.  Two swirling visions are
adrift inline with the bloodstone and amethyst.  Over the bloodstone is one
of an under sea vision.  By the amethyst is one of the great lake in Aylor.

Circling the Platform
  This portion of the platform seems to be the only spot which has any form
of noise to it.  The moss grow here in a deep maroon color, the lichen grow
crisscrossed with a vibrant shade of purple.  It almost seems like they are
trying to compete for the space of this section of the platform.  Two small
stones have been thrust into the ground.  One appears to be a richly veined
piece of turquoise, to which the lichen seem to grow from.  The other stone
is a light yellow piece of topaz.  The stones have odd carvings on them.  A
path from the pillar to these stones has been almost completely grown over.

In the shadow of the Pillar
  This room seems quite dark, no moss or lichen grow here.  A path from the
central pillar and the odd green stone set in the ground here has been worn
into the platform.  A silence seems to be all consuming in this area.  Even
the sound of footsteps are swallowed by this silence.  The stones to either
side seem to twinkle at you.  Off past the edge of the platform you can see
a chaotic swirling mass that shows images of a courtroom.

enter onyx
"onyx"


You step into a Perfect Onyx and arrive in...
Western Royal Gardens
  The royal gardens here are open to everyone. Neatly trimmed hedges divide the
garden into several sections. Roses are growing in front of the hedges in 
this section. An arbor that is covered with roses ranging from white to dark 
red, with every shade in between, leads east towards the center of the 
garden. The grass is trimmed short and the grounds have been raked free of 
leaves.

[ Exits: north east south west ]
A rose bush soaks up the sun.
(Red Aura) A set of weeds have popped up in the gardens.
Blowing in the wind is a large lilac bush.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2054/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor)

>>    
n
Northern Royal Gardens
  A hedge row surrounds this section of the garden.  In the middle stands a
statue of a lion.  The lion faces to the south and looks very realistic.  A
full mane adorns his head and is very detailed.  His eyes and face create a
look of warmth and kindness.  Several children are sitting on his back, and
petting him, just as if he was their best pet.  

[ Exits: north east south west ]
Blowing in the wind is a large lilac bush.

s
Royal Gardens
  Several marble benches surround a fountain.  The fountain has four marble
mermaids who pour water from a carafe in their hands into the basin.  Large
golden fish reflect the sunlight as they swim circles in the fountain.  The
benches are each surrounded by different colors of flowers and have a large
gap in front of the bench so people can sit on them.  The sun has warmed up
the gardens nicely, it is neither hot or cold.  

[ Exits: north east south west ]
(Red Aura) A set of weeds have popped up in the gardens.
Blowing in the wind is a large lilac bush.

Temple of Zeus
  The temple of Zeus is a huge structure dedicated to the head god, Zeus. It 
has a massive roof that has murals depicting battle scenes around the gables.
The roof is supported by tall pillars of polished white marble, and the 
ground around the temple has pillars topped with solid gold statues of Greek 
warriors in full battle armor.

Eastern Royal Gardens

Peak of the Monolith

The Monolith (G)
  As you make your way along the etched ladder you find yourself in an open
expanse.  The monolith somehow supports a large circular platform made from
rock that seems equidistant in all directions.  Twelve stones, each with a
strange marking, are evenly spaced in this circle.  The marks coincide with
deep markings etched on the monolith.  Well worn paths lead from the etched
markings on the monolith and the small stones surrounding it.

A Single Stone
  Moss and lichen seem to have overtaken the platform.  A narrow path leads
to a small ruby sunk into the platform.  The stone is set precisely halfway

no lichen or moss will grow on the paths.  Small disks are littered not far
from the ruby.  The disks have strange lettering on them.  Past the edge of
of the platform you can make out a swirling vision of an arena.

Outer edge of the Platform
  The platform reveals the flawlessness of a circle here.  The rounded edge
has no marks left on it as clues to how it was made.  Two gems are set deep
into the ground here.  One is a large bloodstone and the other is a smaller
amethyst.  Both have strange symbols carved deep into their facets.  A path
leads from the stones back to the central pillar.  Two swirling visions are
adrift inline with the bloodstone and amethyst.  Over the bloodstone is one
of an under sea vision.  By the amethyst is one of the great lake in Aylor.

The Monolith (G)
  As you make your way along the etched ladder you find yourself in an open
expanse.  The monolith somehow supports a large circular platform made from
rock that seems equidistant in all directions.  Twelve stones, each with a
strange marking, are evenly spaced in this circle.  The marks coincide with
deep markings etched on the monolith.  Well worn paths lead from the etched
markings on the monolith and the small stones surrounding it.

Sandy Section (G)
  This part of the platform has been covered with very fine sand.  No trace

  After arriving through the large Ruby, you are standing on a wide expanse
of red sand, spreading out as far as you can see.  You are on a path midway
between the top of a mountain and the depths of a steep-sided gully.  It is
moderately cool here, but the air smells strongly of sheep.  Glancing about
you see rams and goats charging along the mountainside, frequently stopping
to engage in the dramatic head-butting challenge for supremacy.  

[ Exits: up down ]
(Red Aura) (White Aura) A powerful old ram stands here awaiting the next challenge.
A young ram tosses his head about in challenge.
(Red Aura) A handsome billy goat munches as he ignores you.
(Red Aura) (White Aura) A powerful old ram stands here awaiting the next challenge.

u
Approaching the summit
  Huge rocks litter the path here, however they present no obstacles to the
sure-footed animals climbing up and down.  The sand and rocks are intensely
red, yet gives off no heat.  The temperature has dropped and the wind gusts
sharply.  The slope becomes steeper as you approach the top.

Top of the mountain
  This seems to be the preferred location of the head-butting challenges of
the rams.  The wind whips icy air about you, threatening to send you flying
to your hopefully immediate death far below.  One would not enjoy living to
suffer the incredible damage done by the impact of a body on the huge rocks
in the gully below.  The view from here is astonishing, though, nothing but
the expanse of red desert for miles around.

The Monolith (G)
  As you make your way along the etched ladder you find yourself in an open
expanse.  The monolith somehow supports a large circular platform made from
rock that seems equidistant in all directions.  Twelve stones, each with a
strange marking, are evenly spaced in this circle.  The marks coincide with
deep markings etched on the monolith.  Well worn paths lead from the etched
markings on the monolith and the small stones surrounding it.

w
West of the Pillar
  The platform stretches out to the edge from the central pillar.  Moss and
lichen grow here in a dark brown color.  A odd smell of wet goat comes from
this area.  It seems to emanate from the stone set into the ground with the
odd markings.  The stone appears to be a small garnet affixed firmly in the
ground.  The path from here to the central pillar seems to be slightly less
worn.  In the distance a swirling vision shows of a small valley.

n
Outer edge of the Platform
  The platform reveals the flawlessness of a circle here.  The rounded edge
has no marks left on it as clues to how it was made.  Two gems are set deep

amethyst.  Both have strange symbols carved deep into their facets.  A path
leads from the stones back to the central pillar.  Two swirling visions are
adrift inline with the bloodstone and amethyst.  Over the bloodstone is one
of an under sea vision.  By the amethyst is one of the great lake in Aylor.

"topaz"
You step into a Light Topaz and arrive in...
The Entrance to Scorpio
  Waves of heat rise up from the ground.  The hot winds blow drawing up all
moisture from the air.  You find breathing difficult as the heat sears your
lungs.  Blackened rocks and boulders are the only things to be seen in this
stark landscape.  From the top of a slight rise, you look down a dark slope
to a river of lava.  Winding your way down the rocks, you reach the edge of
the river.  There appears to be a vessel of some sort moored to the bank.

to a river of lava.  Winding your way down the rocks, you reach the edge of
the river.  There appears to be a vessel of some sort moored to the bank.  

[ Exits: down ]
     (Magic) The molten corpse of Scorpion worker lies here dripping.
(Red Aura) (White Aura) A scorpion fighter prepares for an attack.

The Entrance to Scorpio
  Waves of heat rise up from the ground.  The hot winds blow drawing up all
moisture from the air.  You find breathing difficult as the heat sears your
lungs.  Blackened rocks and boulders are the only things to be seen in this
stark landscape.  From the top of a slight rise, you look down a dark slope
to a river of lava.  Winding your way down the rocks, you reach the edge of
the river.  There appears to be a vessel of some sort moored to the bank.  

[ Exits: down ]
     (Magic) The molten corpse of Scorpion worker lies here dripping.

On the River
  After arriving at the river's edge, you realize the vessel tied up has to
be made of some sort of material that does not burn.  The temperatures have
risen even further, undoubtedly caused by the molten lava.  The river flows
and plunges away into the distance.  A ramp is set into the ground, leading
down to provide a way of board the vessel safely.  The vessel is firmly and
safely secured by its mooring.  

[ Exits: west up ]
(Red Aura) A menacing scorpion jumps into view, his tail upright and vibrating.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3812/4086 MP  2051/2054 mv  877tnl (Reply: Talbor)

w
Climbing the Mountain
  Odd, this vessel seems to move against the flowing lava, moving steadfast
towards a mountain of basalt.  Looking back you see the lava flowing toward
the bottom of the mountain.  Up ahead the lava levels off.  The vessel runs
up against a landing set into the rock.  Leaving the boat secured on a post
you begin the climb up a rather steep slope leading to what seems to be the
source of the lava flow.  

[ Exits: east west ]

At the top of the Mountain
  Looking around, you notice that you are standing on the rim of a crucible
of liquid fire.  It bubbles, releasing noxious gases, and frequently erupts
into waves of flames.  The heat is intense.  There appears to be absolutely
nothing but burning, boiling lava inside the pit, you surmize that it might
be worth investigating.  You study the walls of the pit and find what could
be steps cut into the stone.  The steps take you around the walls and down.

Inside the Fiery Pit
  Around the pit of molten, bubbling lava, you find a ledge of charred rock
that remains fairly clear of danger.  The air seems extremely toxic.  It is

The Monolith (G) (2053)

A Single Stone
  Moss and lichen seem to have overtaken the platform.  A narrow path leads
to a small ruby sunk into the platform.  The stone is set precisely halfway
from the monolith and the edge of the platform.  It seems almost magical as
no lichen or moss will grow on the paths.  Small disks are littered not far
from the ruby.  The disks have strange lettering on them.  Past the edge of
of the platform you can make out a swirling vision of an arena.  

[ Exits: east south west ]
     (Invis) (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A piece of the central pillar has broken off.

Top of the mountain
  This seems to be the preferred location of the head-butting challenges of

to your hopefully immediate death far below.  One would not enjoy living to
suffer the incredible damage done by the impact of a body on the huge rocks
in the gully below.  The view from here is astonishing, though, nothing but
the expanse of red desert for miles around.

In a deep gully
  At the bottom of the path you are shielded from the wind although you are
not exactly warm, the temperature is at least tolerable.  Sheer cliffs rise
on both sides of the gully which gradually open into a steep canyon.  Sheep
and goats graze at the meager grass found near a slender stream of water.  

[ Exits: up ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A sparkling Diamond flares, nearly blinding you.
(Red Aura) A handsome billy goat munches as he ignores you.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3870/4086 MP  2031/2054 mv  877tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100133 | In a deep gully (U)
>>    You step into a Sparkling Diamond and arrive in...
Peak of the Monolith
  You have reached the peak of the monolith.  There does not seem to be any
air moving around this peak.  As you peer out upon the platform you see the
perfection of the circle and the placement of the markers below.  From this
vantage you can see past the platform.  Fuzzy images seem to be in line
with both the monolith etchings and the stone markers.  A peculiar smell of
brimstone and fresh rain seems to emanate from the monolith itself.  

[ Exits: (up) down ]
(Translucent) (Golden Aura) (White Aura) An old grey-haired man sits here staring up at the heavens.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3870/4086 MP  2031/2054 mv  877tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100133 | Peak of the Monolith ([U]D)
>>    The Monolith (G) (2030)

In the shadow of the Pillar (2029)

Circling the Platform
  This portion of the platform seems to be the only spot which has any form
of noise to it.  The moss grow here in a deep maroon color, the lichen grow
crisscrossed with a vibrant shade of purple.  It almost seems like they are
trying to compete for the space of this section of the platform.  Two small
stones have been thrust into the ground.  One appears to be a richly veined
piece of turquoise, to which the lichen seem to grow from.  The other stone
is a light yellow piece of topaz.  The stones have odd carvings on them.  A
path from the pillar to these stones has been almost completely grown over. 

[ Exits: north east ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A veined Turquoise set in the ground with an odd sign.
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A light Topaz set in the ground with an odd sign.
(Translucent) (Red Aura) A ghostly worshipper praises the pillar.
An unbeliever makes his way around the pillar, cursing it.
(Translucent) (Red Aura) A ghostly worshipper praises the pillar.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3870/4086 MP  2027/2054 mv  877tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100133 | Circling the Platform (NE)
>>    You step into a Light Topaz and arrive in...
The Entrance to Scorpio
  Waves of heat rise up from the ground.  The hot winds blow drawing up all
moisture from the air.  You find breathing difficult as the heat sears your
lungs.  Blackened rocks and boulders are the only things to be seen in this
stark landscape.  From the top of a slight rise, you look down a dark slope
to a river of lava.  Winding your way down the rocks, you reach the edge of
the river.  There appears to be a vessel of some sort moored to the bank.  

[ Exits: down ]
(Red Aura) A menacing scorpion jumps into view, his tail upright and vibrating.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3870/4086 MP  2027/2054 mv  877tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 100133 | The Entrance to Scorpio (D)
>>    On the River (2024)

Climbing the Mountain (2021)

At the top of the Mountain
  Looking around, you notice that you are standing on the rim of a crucible
of liquid fire.  It bubbles, releasing noxious gases, and frequently erupts
into waves of flames.  The heat is intense.  There appears to be absolutely
nothing but burning, boiling lava inside the pit, you surmize that it might
be worth investigating.  You study the walls of the pit and find what could
be steps cut into the stone.  The steps take you around the walls and down. 

[ Exits: east west down ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A scale from a quicksilver dragon reflects light like a mirror.

(Red Aura) (White Aura) A scorpion fighter prepares for an attack.
Waiting to serve her queen, a scorpion worker waits here.

Boot Camp Headquarters (G)
  As you enter the Boot Camp Headquarters, you immediately notice that
the large main hall is adorned with feasting tables and fire pits
allowing the green recruits to relax after a hard days training.
A large mural on the northern wall depicts the founding members of the
Boot Camp standing before The Fallen Soldier on an ancient battlefield.
The other stone walls are decorated in the green and yellow insignia of
Boot Camp and various 'Boot Needs You' posters depicting an alluring Diva
dressed in the Boot Camp colours pointing at you.
From the arches leading out of the hall drift sounds of young recruits
being put through their paces and the smells of gunpowder and mud linger
in the air.

[ Exits: north east (south) west up down ]
(Player) (Golden Aura) Ruo the Elementalist.
(Player) (Invis) (Translucent) (Golden Aura) (White Aura) Tavrin is here.

The Grand City of Aylor (G)
  You stand on the edge of the beautiful City of Aylor.
 
A bright light shines down from the heavens, pouring over you, bathing you
in its warm glow.  Everything around you seems rich and pure in color.  An
enormous, white temple stands to the north, taking up most of your view.
 
To reach the Aylorian Academy, you must travel up the large staircase that
stands just off the side of the church.  (Type 'UP' to learn how to play the
game.)
 
Below you are large piles of armor and equipment discarded by other
adventurers.

INFO: The player rankings have been updated.


       Raganatittu : Save the village in Raganatittu.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Task 1  : Help the village of Raganatittu.

Task 5  : Remove the danger of Nag in the village.

An ancient fakir says, "Now, you need to learn to charm snakes.  As you
 may know, they are mesmerized by melodic sounds, such as from an
 instrument like my own.  I cannot part with my flute, nor can I hunt down
 Nag myself, as I need to watch over my remaining snakes.  You must
 construct a flute of your own, learn to use it and find Nag."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Use 'tasklist' to see a short summary of all open tasks.

A path through the fields (2042)

Nag hisses, rearing back, hood spread, ready to strike.
In a Field
  This field grows millet, the staple grain of these people.  The nearly
ripe grain heads hang heavy on the stem.  The breeze ripples through the
field like waves on the ocean.  Soon, the villagers will come and harvest
this field with hand sickles.  The young children will follow the
harvesters, gleaning every bit of grain they find.

In a Field

tall grasses, each having a bamboo-like stem.  The breeze rustles through the
narrow, sword-shaped leaves.  Insects buzz around the sweet sap oozing from
a cut plant.  Tasting the sap yourself, you realize you are in a field of
sugarcane.

A path through the village (2051)

A path through the village
  This village sure is not very big!  At this end, it backs right up
against the jungle.  Maybe a dozen huts can be seen from here, a few with
their doors open.  Women cook and sew while the men hunt or tend the fields.
Boys fetch water from the river and girls take care of their younger
siblings.  Everyone is busy.  

[ Exits: north east south west ]
     This lightweight loincloth is made from sunbleached cotton.
     This water jar stays cool in the hot, humid air.
     A stone fountain provides the village with cool, sweet, clean water.
     A lychee tree grows here, its branches filled with ripe fruits.
(Golden Aura) A girl helps her mother with day-to-day chores.
(Golden Aura) A man works in the fields.
(Golden Aura) A drab peahen pecks at the ground, searching for food.

fields.  Maybe a dozen huts can be seen.  

[ Exits: north east south west ]
     This steel machete was bought far from the village.
     This kurta is a loose, collarless shirt worn by many men in Raganatittu.
     These pyjamas are loosely woven from undyed cotton and have a drawstring waist.
     This turban is hand woven of unbleached cotton.
     A sweet orange tree grows here, its branches filled with ripe oranges.
(Golden Aura) A member of the dhole pack watches from the shadows.
(Golden Aura) A man works in the fields.
(Golden Aura) An iridescent black bird watches you.
(Golden Aura) A boy carries water.
(Golden Aura) A dark-eyed woman in a colorful sari prepares food for her family.
(Golden Aura) This swamp deer likes to stay by the riverbanks.
(Golden Aura) A member of the dhole pack watches from the shadows.
(Golden Aura) A long-nosed deer makes a funny barking sound.

Lv 131  G 98889 | A path through the village (NESW)
e
>>    A path through the village
  This village sure is not very big!  At this end, it backs right up
against the jungle.  Maybe a dozen huts can be seen from here, a few with
their doors open.  Women cook and sew while the men hunt or tend the fields.
Boys fetch water from the river and girls take care of their younger
siblings.  Everyone is busy.  

[ Exits: north east south west ]
     This lightweight loincloth is made from sunbleached cotton.
     This water jar stays cool in the hot, humid air.
     A stone fountain provides the village with cool, sweet, clean water.
     A lychee tree grows here, its branches filled with ripe fruits.
(Golden Aura) A girl helps her mother with day-to-day chores.
(Golden Aura) A man works in the fields.
(Golden Aura) A drab peahen pecks at the ground, searching for food.

>>    In a Simple Hut
  You are in a yet another simple two room hut.  A low table can be seen
and a platform with a pallet where the children sleep.  Shelves line the
wall, food stored in jars on them.  The other door probably leads to a
sleeping room.

n
A path through the fields
  Here the path is wider and smoother.  Prints from many feet can be seen
in the packed dirt.  Cultivated fields stretch out on either side of you,
verdant green in the sun.  Shouts and laughter of children at play reach
your ears.  Everything appears peaceful, but beware what lurks in the grass.
West is the village shrine and south is the village itself.  East leads back
to the fields.  

[ Exits: east south west ]
     A fig tree grows here, its branches filled with ripe figs.
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A hump-backed cow grazes peacefully.
(Golden Aura) A member of the dhole pack watches from the shadows.
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A hump-backed cow grazes peacefully.

(Golden Aura) A long-nosed deer makes a funny barking sound.
(Golden Aura) A drab peahen pecks at the ground, searching for food.

A path through the fields
  Here the path is wider and smoother.  Prints from many feet can be seen
in the packed dirt.  Cultivated fields stretch out on either side of you,
verdant green in the sun.  Shouts and laughter of children at play reach
your ears.  Everything appears peaceful, but beware what lurks in the grass.
To the north is a sugarcane field and to the south is a field of millet.  

[ Exits: north east south west ]
     A steel key lies here.
     An old pomegranate tree grows here, its branches filled with ripe pomegranates.

s
In a Field
  This field grows millet, the staple grain of these people.  The nearly
ripe grain heads hang heavy on the stem.  The breeze ripples through the
field like waves on the ocean.  Soon, the villagers will come and harvest
this field with hand sickles.  The young children will follow the
harvesters, gleaning every bit of grain they find.  


[ Exits: north ]
     This tiny grain plant is nearly ripe.
(Golden Aura) A drab peahen pecks at the ground, searching for food.

>>    In a Field
  It is humid here, close to the river.  This field is crowded with very
tall grasses, each having a bamboo-like stem.  The breeze rustles through the
narrow, sword-shaped leaves.  Insects buzz around the sweet sap oozing from
a cut plant.  Tasting the sap yourself, you realize you are in a field of
sugarcane.

n
On an old bridge
  Here is the most dilapidated bridge you have ever seen!  Its weathered
grey planks are splintered and broken and more than half of them are
missing.  You look over the edge to see the rotting pilings sunk deep into
the mud banks.  Apparently, there is no other way across.  Gathering your
courage, you take one slow, careful step out onto the bridge.  It shudders
and groans under your weight.  I hope you make it across!  

[ Exits: north south ]

In a small shrine
  It's obvious that all the wealth and artistic expression in this humble
village go to this small shrine.  A large statue of Ganesha is here, an
offering of fragrant incense lit at its base.  The walls are covered with
colorful, exquisitely detailed paintings.  Fragrant flowers, mostly orchids,
cover the altar.  

[ Exits: east ]
     (Glow) This burning incense is scented with sandalwood.
     A cluster of fragrant, yellow orchids hang from a tree.
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A statue of the elephant-headed Hindu god, Shri Ganesha graces this
temple.

     This turban is hand woven of unbleached cotton.
     A sweet orange tree grows here, its branches filled with ripe oranges.

A path through the village
  The path gets wider again as you enter a small village.  Peacocks strut
along the road.  Boys chase each other while young girls watch even younger
babies or help their mothers with the daily chores.  Men hunt and tend the
fields.  Maybe a dozen huts can be seen.

  This village sure is not very big!  At this end, it backs right up

siblings.  Everyone is busy.

n
A path through the fields
  Here the path is wider and smoother.  Prints from many feet can be seen
in the packed dirt.  Cultivated fields stretch out on either side of you,
verdant green in the sun.  Shouts and laughter of children at play reach
your ears.  Everything appears peaceful, but beware what lurks in the grass.
West is the village shrine and south is the village itself.  East leads back
to the fields.  

[ Exits: east south west ]
     A fig tree grows here, its branches filled with ripe figs.
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A hump-backed cow grazes peacefully.
(Golden Aura) A spotted deer blends into the foliage.
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A hump-backed cow grazes peacefully.
(Golden Aura) A member of the dhole pack watches from the shadows.

(Golden Aura) A long-nosed deer makes a funny barking sound.
(Golden Aura) A drab peahen pecks at the ground, searching for food.

In a Field
  This field grows millet, the staple grain of these people.  The nearly
ripe grain heads hang heavy on the stem.  The breeze ripples through the
field like waves on the ocean.  Soon, the villagers will come and harvest
this field with hand sickles.  The young children will follow the
harvesters, gleaning every bit of grain they find.  

[ Exits: north ]
     This tiny grain plant is nearly ripe.

A path through the fields
  Here the path is wider and smoother.  Prints from many feet can be seen
in the packed dirt.  Cultivated fields stretch out on either side of you,
verdant green in the sun.  Shouts and laughter of children at play reach
your ears.  Everything appears peaceful, but beware what lurks in the grass.
To the north is a sugarcane field and to the south is a field of millet.  

[ Exits: north east south west ]
     A steel key lies here.
     An old pomegranate tree grows here, its branches filled with ripe pomegranates.
(Golden Aura) A fat, reddish-feathered bird pecks at the ground.
(Golden Aura) An iridescent black bird watches you.
(Golden Aura) A member of the dhole pack watches from the shadows.
(Red Aura) Nag slithers by, looking for someone to bite.
(Golden Aura) A fat, reddish-feathered bird pecks at the ground.
(Golden Aura) This small weasel jumps quickly away, chittering.
(Golden Aura) Riki Tiki Tavi patrols the garden for threats to the boy.
(Golden Aura) An iridescent black bird watches you.
Nag hisses, rearing back, hood spread, ready to strike.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2052/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 98889 | A path through the fields (NESW)
>>    
e
On a jungle path
  The jungle is a little less dense here, allowing golden beams of sunshine
to spear through the trees.  The animal sounds have receded and human sounds
have emerged.  You hear the shouts of children playing to the west.  

[ Exits: north west ]
     A thicket of banana trees grows here, with several huge bunches of bananas ready for picking.
(Hidden) (Golden Aura) A brilliant green chameleon zaps insects with its sticky tongue.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2050/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 98889 | A path through the fields (NESW)
>>    In a Field
  It is humid here, close to the river.  This field is crowded with very
tall grasses, each having a bamboo-like stem.  The breeze rustles through the
narrow, sword-shaped leaves.  Insects buzz around the sweet sap oozing from
a cut plant.  Tasting the sap yourself, you realize you are in a field of
sugarcane.

[ Exits: south ]
     This sugar cane is leaking sweet sap.
(Golden Aura) A dark-eyed woman in a colorful sari prepares food for her family.
(Golden Aura) A member of the dhole pack watches from the shadows.
(Golden Aura) A spotted deer blends into the foliage.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2048/2054 mv  887tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 98889 | A path through the fields (NESW)
>>    In a Field
  This field grows millet, the staple grain of these people.  The nearly
ripe grain heads hang heavy on the stem.  The breeze ripples through the
field like waves on the ocean.  Soon, the villagers will come and harvest
this field with hand sickles.  The young children will follow the
harvesters, gleaning every bit of grain they find.  

[ Exits: north ]
     This tiny grain plant is nearly ripe.
(Golden Aura) A drab peahen pecks at the ground, searching for food.
(Golden Aura) An iridescent black bird watches you.
(Golden Aura) This small weasel jumps quickly away, chittering.
(Golden Aura) This swamp deer likes to stay by the riverbanks.
(Golden Aura) A drab peahen pecks at the ground, searching for food.
(Golden Aura) A girl helps her mother with day-to-day chores.

to the fields.

Lv 131  G 98889 | A path through the fields (ESW)
>>    In a small shrine
  It's obvious that all the wealth and artistic expression in this humble
village go to this small shrine.  A large statue of Ganesha is here, an
offering of fragrant incense lit at its base.  The walls are covered with
colorful, exquisitely detailed paintings.  Fragrant flowers, mostly orchids,
cover the altar.  

[ Exits: east ]
     (Glow) This burning incense is scented with sandalwood.
     A cluster of fragrant, yellow orchids hang from a tree.
(Golden Aura) (White Aura) A statue of the elephant-headed Hindu god, Shri Ganesha graces this
temple.

A path through the village
  The path gets wider again as you enter a small village.  Peacocks strut
along the road.  Boys chase each other while young girls watch even younger
babies or help their mothers with the daily chores.  Men hunt and tend the
fields.  Maybe a dozen huts can be seen.  

[ Exits: north east south west ]
     This steel machete was bought far from the village.
     This kurta is a loose, collarless shirt worn by many men in Raganatittu.
     These pyjamas are loosely woven from undyed cotton and have a drawstring waist.
     This turban is hand woven of unbleached cotton.
     A sweet orange tree grows here, its branches filled with ripe oranges.
(Golden Aura) A drab peahen pecks at the ground, searching for food.

s
>>    
A path through the village
  This village sure is not very big!  At this end, it backs right up
against the jungle.  Maybe a dozen huts can be seen from here, a few with
their doors open.  Women cook and sew while the men hunt or tend the fields.
Boys fetch water from the river and girls take care of their younger
siblings.  Everyone is busy.  

[ Exits: north east south west ]
     This lightweight loincloth is made from sunbleached cotton.
     This water jar stays cool in the hot, humid air.
     A stone fountain provides the village with cool, sweet, clean water.
     A lychee tree grows here, its branches filled with ripe fruits.
(Golden Aura) A man works in the fields.
(Golden Aura) A drab peahen pecks at the ground, searching for food.

platform with a pallet where the children sleep.  Shelves line the wall,

room.

as you notice the serpent begin to relax.  Off key, out of tune, and without any sense of rhythm... 
you quickly finish.  Relieved that it didn't take real musical talent or training, you've met with 
success.

In a small shrine
  It's obvious that all the wealth and artistic expression in this humble
village go to this small shrine.  A large statue of Ganesha is here, an
offering of fragrant incense lit at its base.  The walls are covered with
colorful, exquisitely detailed paintings.  Fragrant flowers, mostly orchids,
cover the altar.

Boot Camp Headquarters (G)
  As you enter the Boot Camp Headquarters, you immediately notice that
the large main hall is adorned with feasting tables and fire pits
allowing the green recruits to relax after a hard days training.
A large mural on the northern wall depicts the founding members of the
Boot Camp standing before The Fallen Soldier on an ancient battlefield.
The other stone walls are decorated in the green and yellow insignia of
Boot Camp and various 'Boot Needs You' posters depicting an alluring Diva
dressed in the Boot Camp colours pointing at you.
From the arches leading out of the hall drift sounds of young recruits
being put through their paces and the smells of gunpowder and mud linger
in the air.

[ Exits: north east (south) west up down ]
(Player) (Golden Aura) Ruo the Elementalist.
(Player) (Invis) (Translucent) (Golden Aura) (White Aura) Tavrin is here.

The Grand City of Aylor (G)
  You stand on the edge of the beautiful City of Aylor.
 
A bright light shines down from the heavens, pouring over you, bathing you
in its warm glow.  Everything around you seems rich and pure in color.  An
enormous, white temple stands to the north, taking up most of your view.
 
To reach the Aylorian Academy, you must travel up the large staircase that
stands just off the side of the church.  (Type 'UP' to learn how to play the
game.)
 
Below you are large piles of armor and equipment discarded by other
adventurers.

The dark cave (2053)

A rough hewn passageway of stone (2052)

A rough hewn passageway of stone (2051)

A large, lit cavern (G)
  A ladder descends through a hole in the floor here; unfortunately it is 
covered by some type of glass dome with a strange lock on it. You nearly jump
out of your boots as a deep hiss comes from a dark corner of the room. You 
leap back and ready your weapons as a sword narrowly whistles past your gut.
Trembling, you face your opponent, the eight armed skeleton that the 
villagers told you about. Its eyes glow bright red, a deep hatred of your 
life plainly visible in them. It unslings three shields and draws four more 
swords. Set to advance, you quickly realize this may very well be the end of 
your life. Your thoughts fade as it comes at you, blades whistling through 
the air...

The dark cave
  Entering the dark cave, an overwhelming feeling of dread and despair fills 
your being. Smells of rotten decay waft up from below with sounds that pierce
your being and make the hairs on your neck stand on end. You wonder if this 
adventure is really worth the rewards after hearing tales in the village 
about an eight-armed skeleton who stole a woman only two days ago. Maybe it 
was just the peasant's imagination working during the excitement of the 
moment. Looking around to make sure it's safe to go down, you notice 
something scrawled on the wall.

[ Exits: south down ]

l;ex
A rough hewn passageway of stone
  Rounding the bend you are quite surprised to find yourself face to face with 
some human priests! They appear to have captured a ghoul and tied it to the 
ground. Amazing! They are actually trying to exorcise its evil animating 
magics! Apparently you are not the only one here trying to help out the poor 
people of Dortmund. One of the priests sees you enter the room, "Don't just 
stand there- help hold this thing down, for crying out loud!"

nails.

Before the door
  Standing before the door you can see faint traces of light coming from around
its edges, and you can just barely make out what sounds like a boiling noise 
coming from inside. Pushing against the door you find it locked. Taking a 
mighty swing with your axe results in a chipped blade. This door is protected
by some sort of powerful magic enchantment. You wonder what it will take to 
break this spell so you can find out what's going on inside...

[ Exits: (north) east south west up ]
(Hidden) (Translucent) (Red Aura) A nasty-looking grey-skinned man stands here with filth-encrusted
nails.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3452/3478 HP  2867/4086 MP  2050/2054 mv  881tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 99388 | Before the door ([N]ESWU)
>>    
s
A rough hewn passageway of stone
  Drawing closer, you are positive you can see a door at the end of this 
passageway now. It seems as though it only grows darker the closer you get.
Holding your hand up in front of your face, you make sure this really is 
real. As the light flickers around your skin, so warm and full of life, you 
shudder at the thought of what it must be like to die or become trapped in a 
place of such everlasting cold and darkness...

[ Exits: north east south west up down ]
(Translucent) (Red Aura) Some beautiful men and women stand in this room flirting with you!

s
A rough hewn passageway of stone
  Standing outside what appears to be doorways on either side of you, you 
struggle to see into either room, but the twisting rock curves around, 
keeping you from seeing what awaits in them. Strangely enough you think you 
see a dim glow of light coming from the west room, while the east room 
remains completely black. Looking down you notice a thin trail of blood 
running along the floor and leading into the west room...

A dimly lit room
  A small man and woman sit here at a table; a single candle flickers and burns
on a small stand to one side. Grinning, the man rises and greets you.
"Hello, I'm Randall Fen-rir Get and this is my wife Tikki." Lowering his 
voice to a low snarl, he gestures to the table. "Care to join us for a 
feast?" Raising your torch lets you see that a human hand rests on the plate 
before him, while his wife Tikki calmly rips another bite from the forearm 
she holds...

A large, lit cavern (G)
  A ladder descends through a hole in the floor here; unfortunately it is 
covered by some type of glass dome with a strange lock on it. You nearly jump
out of your boots as a deep hiss comes from a dark corner of the room. You 
leap back and ready your weapons as a sword narrowly whistles past your gut.
Trembling, you face your opponent, the eight armed skeleton that the 
villagers told you about. Its eyes glow bright red, a deep hatred of your 
life plainly visible in them. It unslings three shields and draws four more 
swords. Set to advance, you quickly realize this may very well be the end of 
your life. Your thoughts fade as it comes at you, blades whistling through 
the air...

[ Exits: east west (down) ]
     (Magic) (Glow) A goat seems to have started gnawing into a small tree.

A cavern
  Strange urns line the back wall of this cavern. As you enter, they begin to 
glow and hum softly. Low moans and some wailing begin to emanate from them.
A lid pops off one of the urns and a translucent figure begins to slowly pull
itself through the opening. It is the size of a man, it even looks like a 
man, but it is transparent. With a soft glow, it hovers just above the floor.
Waiting patiently, it watches as others join it from the rest of the urns.
Once they are all out they give a nod to each other and move towards you.

A rough hewn passageway of stone (2015)

hunt wounded
A cavern
  This cavern seems to be some sort of refuse dump for body parts and personal 
belongings. Apparently there must be someone else around here to use this 
cavern as a waste room; certainly the undead would not care about such 
things. As you wonder about this discovery you sense some movement coming 
from the heaps of rotting flesh and clothing. Bracing yourself, you watch 
cautiously for the source. Suddenly you are showered by clumps of rot as a 
huge bulbous creature emerges, waving two tentacled arms about. It gnashes 
its teeth in a grotesque central maw as its single eye darts back and forth 
seemingly to keep you in its field of vision.

[ Exits: east ]

A rough hewn passageway of stone
  Moving farther into the stone tunnels, you find yourself standing outside of 
what appears to be more cavern entrances. A high pitched shriek rings out and
the sounds of steel clashing reach your ears. More shouts and curses follow 
the sounds of battle and an elven warrior dressed in gleaming chainmail 
staggers from the west room. He falls to one knee and supports himself on the
hilt of his sword. Blood runs freely from a nasty wound in his side. Looking 
up he motions you closer, "Please I beg of you, HELP THEM!"

w


A cavern
  Running into the room, you see a band of elven warriors standing together in 
a tight formation. Shields and swords drawn, they are facing a huge beast.
It appears to be some form of bear, but it has to be undead. Its ribcage 
shows exposed bone gleaming whitely in the torch light, and numerous other 
pieces of it seem to have just fallen off. The elves are obviously 
well-trained, and they move forward in unison attacking the beast 
ferociously, hacking lumps of flesh from its body. It roars in frustration 
and, seemingly unaffected, it charges!

[ Exits: east ]

A large, lit cavern (G)
  A ladder descends through a hole in the floor here; unfortunately it is 
covered by some type of glass dome with a strange lock on it. You nearly jump
out of your boots as a deep hiss comes from a dark corner of the room. You 
leap back and ready your weapons as a sword narrowly whistles past your gut.
Trembling, you face your opponent, the eight armed skeleton that the 
villagers told you about. Its eyes glow bright red, a deep hatred of your 
life plainly visible in them. It unslings three shields and draws four more 
swords. Set to advance, you quickly realize this may very well be the end of 
your life. Your thoughts fade as it comes at you, blades whistling through 
the air...

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3454/4086 MP  2034/2054 mv  881tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 99388 | A rough hewn passageway of stone (NESWUD)
>>    A cavern
  Running into the room, you see a band of elven warriors standing together in 
a tight formation. Shields and swords drawn, they are facing a huge beast.
It appears to be some form of bear, but it has to be undead. Its ribcage 
shows exposed bone gleaming whitely in the torch light, and numerous other 
pieces of it seem to have just fallen off. The elves are obviously 
well-trained, and they move forward in unison attacking the beast 
ferociously, hacking lumps of flesh from its body. It roars in frustration 
and, seemingly unaffected, it charges!

[ Exits: east ]

A rough hewn passageway of stone (2045)

A large, lit cavern (G)
  A ladder descends through a hole in the floor here; unfortunately it is 
covered by some type of glass dome with a strange lock on it. You nearly jump
out of your boots as a deep hiss comes from a dark corner of the room. You 
leap back and ready your weapons as a sword narrowly whistles past your gut.
Trembling, you face your opponent, the eight armed skeleton that the 
villagers told you about. Its eyes glow bright red, a deep hatred of your 
life plainly visible in them. It unslings three shields and draws four more 
swords. Set to advance, you quickly realize this may very well be the end of 
your life. Your thoughts fade as it comes at you, blades whistling through 
the air...

[ Exits: east west down ]

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3541/4086 MP  2048/2054 mv  881tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 99388 | A large, lit cavern (EWD)
>>    The temple entry (G)
  Climbing down the ladder, you are amazed to find that you are in an actual 
section that has been carved out. Torches line the smooth stone walls and 
give off a friendly light making you feel more at ease. That is, until the 
chanting starts. Stepping up to the door, you press your ear against the cool
wood and listen intently. Several voices are coming from somewhere ahead; 
they are very faint. If this room were not so quiet, you really doubt you 
would have noticed them at all. Taking advantage of not being discovered yet,
you stop to look around. A strange symbol decorates the east wall.

[ Exits: north up ]

n
Staging area
  This room is huge. It stretches northwards, and you can see several figures 
huddled around what appears to be a table. Bloody barred cells line the east 
wall and there is another wooden door to the west. Dozens of corpses lie 
about this room in various stages. Some are only skeletal, others appear to 
be in various stages of decomposition, while a few appear to have a drained 
look. Odd that they are just lying about stacked like this. Perhaps they are 
just waiting to be enchanted with the force that will give them undead 
life...

[ Exits: north (east) south (west) ]
(Red Aura) An unfinished, undead creation rises up from the floor seeking a soul.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3541/4086 MP  2047/2054 mv  881tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 99388 | Staging area (N[E]S[W])
>>    
n
Altar of sacrifice
  Drawing closer, you see that there is no table here but in fact a bloody 
altar. Several men stand around the altar chanting over the body of a young 
woman who is chained down to it. Holding hands with their eyes closed they 
don't seem to notice you walk up. You can see that their skin is gray and has
a leathery look to it. These are not men- they are undead performing some 
dark ritual! Suddenly the chanting rises in volume until it becomes almost a 
yell. The man in the center, at the head of the altar, suddenly steps forward
and drives his hand into the young woman's chest! The still living girl lets 
out a low moan. As her last breath escapes her, the evil priest pulls her 
still-beating heart out and holds it high. Suddenly seeing you, he screams in
rage, "Kill this fool! No mortal will ever witness such a ceremony and escape
to tell about it!" The undead priests turn on you as he flees north.

[ Exits: north (east) south ]

(Red Aura) An unfinished, undead creation rises up from the floor seeking a soul.
(Red Aura) An unfinished, undead creation rises up from the floor seeking a soul.
(Red Aura) An unfinished, undead creation rises up from the floor seeking a soul.
(Red Aura) An unfinished, undead creation rises up from the floor seeking a soul.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3541/4086 MP  2047/2054 mv  881tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 99388 | Staging area (NESW)
>>    
n
Altar of sacrifice
  Drawing closer, you see that there is no table here but in fact a bloody 
altar. Several men stand around the altar chanting over the body of a young 
woman who is chained down to it. Holding hands with their eyes closed they 
don't seem to notice you walk up. You can see that their skin is gray and has
a leathery look to it. These are not men- they are undead performing some 
dark ritual! Suddenly the chanting rises in volume until it becomes almost a 
yell. The man in the center, at the head of the altar, suddenly steps forward
and drives his hand into the young woman's chest! The still living girl lets 
out a low moan. As her last breath escapes her, the evil priest pulls her 
still-beating heart out and holds it high. Suddenly seeing you, he screams in
rage, "Kill this fool! No mortal will ever witness such a ceremony and escape
to tell about it!" The undead priests turn on you as he flees north.

[ Exits: north (east) south ]
     (Magic) A bloody golden altar rests in this room.
(Red Aura) An undead priest wearing a short robe chants some unknown words.
(Red Aura) An undead priest wearing a short robe chants some unknown words.
(Red Aura) An undead priest wearing a short robe chants some unknown words.
(Invis) (Red Aura) An undead priest dressed in long, flowing black robes stands here praying.
(Red Aura) An undead priest wearing a short robe chants some unknown words.
(Invis) (Red Aura) An undead priest dressed in long, flowing black robes stands here praying.

The dark cave (2053)

A rough hewn passageway of stone (2052)

A rough hewn passageway of stone (2051)

Skeleton hisses at you!
A large, lit cavern (G)
  A ladder descends through a hole in the floor here; unfortunately it is 
covered by some type of glass dome with a strange lock on it. You nearly jump
out of your boots as a deep hiss comes from a dark corner of the room. You 
leap back and ready your weapons as a sword narrowly whistles past your gut.
Trembling, you face your opponent, the eight armed skeleton that the 
villagers told you about. Its eyes glow bright red, a deep hatred of your 
life plainly visible in them. It unslings three shields and draws four more 
swords. Set to advance, you quickly realize this may very well be the end of 
your life. Your thoughts fade as it comes at you, blades whistling through 
the air...

[ Exits: east west down ]
     (Magic) (Glow) A goat seems to have started gnawing into a small tree.
     (Magic) (Glow) A set of odd colored cloth lies here, flames seem not to affect it.
(Red Aura) An insane-looking, green-skinned, bald man sits here gnawing on a bone.
(Red Aura) (Angry) An eight armed skeleton stands here wielding several swords and three shields!
(Translucent) (Red Aura) A filthy grey-skinned creature glows slightly as it runs about the room.
(Translucent) (Red Aura) A black shadow slides around the room here.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3607/4086 MP  2050/2054 mv  881tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 99388 | A large, lit cavern (EWD)
>>    The door is already open.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3607/4086 MP  2050/2054 mv  881tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 99388 | A large, lit cavern (EWD)
>>    The temple entry (G)
  Climbing down the ladder, you are amazed to find that you are in an actual 
section that has been carved out. Torches line the smooth stone walls and 
give off a friendly light making you feel more at ease. That is, until the 
chanting starts. Stepping up to the door, you press your ear against the cool
wood and listen intently. Several voices are coming from somewhere ahead; 
they are very faint. If this room were not so quiet, you really doubt you 
would have noticed them at all. Taking advantage of not being discovered yet,
you stop to look around. A strange symbol decorates the east wall.

[ Exits: north up ]

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3607/4086 MP  2049/2054 mv  881tnl (Reply: Talbor)

Lv 131  G 99388 | A dim hallway (NS)
n
>>    Staging area
  This room is huge. It stretches northwards, and you can see several figures 
huddled around what appears to be a table. Bloody barred cells line the east 
wall and there is another wooden door to the west. Dozens of corpses lie 
about this room in various stages. Some are only skeletal, others appear to 
be in various stages of decomposition, while a few appear to have a drained 
look. Odd that they are just lying about stacked like this. Perhaps they are 
just waiting to be enchanted with the force that will give them undead 
life...

A large, lit cavern (G)
  A ladder descends through a hole in the floor here; unfortunately it is 
covered by some type of glass dome with a strange lock on it. You nearly jump
out of your boots as a deep hiss comes from a dark corner of the room. You 
leap back and ready your weapons as a sword narrowly whistles past your gut.
Trembling, you face your opponent, the eight armed skeleton that the 
villagers told you about. Its eyes glow bright red, a deep hatred of your 
life plainly visible in them. It unslings three shields and draws four more 
swords. Set to advance, you quickly realize this may very well be the end of 
your life. Your thoughts fade as it comes at you, blades whistling through 
the air...

>>    
Altar of sacrifice
  Drawing closer, you see that there is no table here but in fact a bloody 
altar. Several men stand around the altar chanting over the body of a young 
woman who is chained down to it. Holding hands with their eyes closed they 
don't seem to notice you walk up. You can see that their skin is gray and has
a leathery look to it. These are not men- they are undead performing some 
dark ritual! Suddenly the chanting rises in volume until it becomes almost a 
yell. The man in the center, at the head of the altar, suddenly steps forward
and drives his hand into the young woman's chest! The still living girl lets 
out a low moan. As her last breath escapes her, the evil priest pulls her 
still-beating heart out and holds it high. Suddenly seeing you, he screams in
rage, "Kill this fool! No mortal will ever witness such a ceremony and escape
to tell about it!" The undead priests turn on you as he flees north.

>>    The glass portal
  At last the high priest stands before you. Holding the still-beating heart 
defiantly in one hand he beckons you forward. "You cannot stop us, even if 
you slay me. Alister will not fall before you! This heart is the key and if 
you take another step I will cast it into the portal!" Glancing past him you 
see a terrible sight. A sheet of what appears to be glass stands suspended in
mid-air with no apparent supports. It swirls with black clouds and every few 
seconds lightning streaks across the surface of it. A deep rumbling rolls 
through the room and you look back to the priest to see his evil grin of 
triumph. He laughs insanely, confident you are lost.

Alister's study
  This room is lined with thousands of books and scrolls. They run the length 
of the walls, from floor to ceiling, and even that is not enough room.
Scattered piles of books are strewn about the room around a large oak desk.
Seated there sits what appears to be a man. It must be Alister. Without 
saying a word he turns to face you. He appears to be a skeleton but you sense
something is different about him. Great power emanates from his being and his
eyes remain intact in his skeletal form. He rises to stand before you.

[ Exits: south ]
(Invis) (Red Aura) (White Aura) A lich sits at the desk studying something; he glows with power.
Alister exclaims, "I knew someone would come, but not to worry.  You
 cannot stop what is already in motion.  Even if you defeat me now I will
 be born again. Resurrected by the great God of all things terrible,
 Nerull, my lord and savior, is on his way!  NOW TASTE MY POWER!!"

Alister's study
  This room is lined with thousands of books and scrolls. They run the length 
of the walls, from floor to ceiling, and even that is not enough room.
Scattered piles of books are strewn about the room around a large oak desk.
Seated there sits what appears to be a man. It must be Alister. Without 
saying a word he turns to face you. He appears to be a skeleton but you sense
something is different about him. Great power emanates from his being and his
eyes remain intact in his skeletal form. He rises to stand before you.

[ Exits: south ]
     The molten corpse of Alister lies here dripping.

s
The glass portal
  At last the high priest stands before you. Holding the still-beating heart 
defiantly in one hand he beckons you forward. "You cannot stop us, even if 
you slay me. Alister will not fall before you! This heart is the key and if 
you take another step I will cast it into the portal!" Glancing past him you 
see a terrible sight. A sheet of what appears to be glass stands suspended in
mid-air with no apparent supports. It swirls with black clouds and every few 
seconds lightning streaks across the surface of it. A deep rumbling rolls 
through the room and you look back to the priest to see his evil grin of 
triumph. He laughs insanely, confident you are lost.

[ Exits: north south ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A flat plane of glass stands upright here, a storm swirling in the middle
of it.
(Invis) (Red Aura) The high priest of Nerull stands here completing a sacrifice.

Global Quest: Global Quest # 5377 has been won by Sning - 1st win.


enter glass
"glass"
You step into the glass portal and arrive in...
Chamber of the cauldron
  Finally entering this room, you realize your efforts were not enough to stop 
the evil from being released. A huge black cauldron rests over a magical blue
fire in the center of a pentagram. Foul sulfurous fumes rise up from the 
boiling green liquid, and a shape begins to take form. The green goo begins 
to rock from side to side; growing in its actions, it starts to actually rise
up from out of the cauldron. Seeming as though it is trying to pull itself 
from within the container, it reaches higher and higher towards the ceiling 
until suddenly it stops. The liquid suspended in a column continues to flow 
up and down in a swirling pattern and features begin to form. In horror you 
watch as a skeleton ten feet tall steps from within the goo. Reaching back 
into the cauldron it pulls a robe as dark as the darkest night from within 
and dons it. Again reaching into the infernal mix it pulls out a huge scythe.
Turning to face you, the being speaks, "I am Nerull the god of all evils.
Death, pestilence, famine, suffering, and decay are my tools of pleasure, and
the ever living undead are my children. Have you come to serve me or fall 
beneath the path of my destruction?" 

[ Exits: (south) ]
     (Magic) A bloody heart lays on the floor beating furiously.
(Invis) (White Aura) The grim reaper stands before you, holding his scythe.

Chamber of the cauldron
  Finally entering this room, you realize your efforts were not enough to stop 
the evil from being released. A huge black cauldron rests over a magical blue
fire in the center of a pentagram. Foul sulfurous fumes rise up from the 
boiling green liquid, and a shape begins to take form. The green goo begins 
to rock from side to side; growing in its actions, it starts to actually rise
up from out of the cauldron. Seeming as though it is trying to pull itself 
from within the container, it reaches higher and higher towards the ceiling 
until suddenly it stops. The liquid suspended in a column continues to flow 
up and down in a swirling pattern and features begin to form. In horror you 
watch as a skeleton ten feet tall steps from within the goo. Reaching back 
into the cauldron it pulls a robe as dark as the darkest night from within 
and dons it. Again reaching into the infernal mix it pulls out a huge scythe.
Turning to face you, the being speaks, "I am Nerull the god of all evils.
Death, pestilence, famine, suffering, and decay are my tools of pleasure, and
the ever living undead are my children. Have you come to serve me or fall

l;ex
Chamber of the cauldron
  Finally entering this room, you realize your efforts were not enough to stop 
the evil from being released. A huge black cauldron rests over a magical blue
fire in the center of a pentagram. Foul sulfurous fumes rise up from the 
boiling green liquid, and a shape begins to take form. The green goo begins 
to rock from side to side; growing in its actions, it starts to actually rise
up from out of the cauldron. Seeming as though it is trying to pull itself 
from within the container, it reaches higher and higher towards the ceiling 
until suddenly it stops. The liquid suspended in a column continues to flow 
up and down in a swirling pattern and features begin to form. In horror you 
watch as a skeleton ten feet tall steps from within the goo. Reaching back 
into the cauldron it pulls a robe as dark as the darkest night from within 
and dons it. Again reaching into the infernal mix it pulls out a huge scythe.
Turning to face you, the being speaks, "I am Nerull the god of all evils.
Death, pestilence, famine, suffering, and decay are my tools of pleasure, and
the ever living undead are my children. Have you come to serve me or fall 
beneath the path of my destruction?" 

[ Exits: (south) ]
     (Magic) The huge skeletal head of Nerull lies here.

>>    Boot Camp Headquarters (G)
  As you enter the Boot Camp Headquarters, you immediately notice that
the large main hall is adorned with feasting tables and fire pits
allowing the green recruits to relax after a hard days training.
A large mural on the northern wall depicts the founding members of the
Boot Camp standing before The Fallen Soldier on an ancient battlefield.
The other stone walls are decorated in the green and yellow insignia of
Boot Camp and various 'Boot Needs You' posters depicting an alluring Diva
dressed in the Boot Camp colours pointing at you.
From the arches leading out of the hall drift sounds of young recruits
being put through their paces and the smells of gunpowder and mud linger
in the air.

The Grand City of Aylor (G)
  You stand on the edge of the beautiful City of Aylor.
 
A bright light shines down from the heavens, pouring over you, bathing you
in its warm glow.  Everything around you seems rich and pure in color.  An
enormous, white temple stands to the north, taking up most of your view.

stands just off the side of the church.  (Type 'UP' to learn how to play the
game.)

adventurers.

>>    WHOOOOOOOOOOOOSH!
Boot Camp Headquarters (G)
  As you enter the Boot Camp Headquarters, you immediately notice that
the large main hall is adorned with feasting tables and fire pits
allowing the green recruits to relax after a hard days training.
A large mural on the northern wall depicts the founding members of the
Boot Camp standing before The Fallen Soldier on an ancient battlefield.
The other stone walls are decorated in the green and yellow insignia of
Boot Camp and various 'Boot Needs You' posters depicting an alluring Diva
dressed in the Boot Camp colours pointing at you.
From the arches leading out of the hall drift sounds of young recruits
being put through their paces and the smells of gunpowder and mud linger
in the air.

[ Exits: north east (south) west up down ]

The Grand City of Aylor (G)
  You stand on the edge of the beautiful City of Aylor.
 
A bright light shines down from the heavens, pouring over you, bathing you
in its warm glow.  Everything around you seems rich and pure in color.  An
enormous, white temple stands to the north, taking up most of your view.
 
To reach the Aylorian Academy, you must travel up the large staircase that
stands just off the side of the church.  (Type 'UP' to learn how to play the
game.)
 
Below you are large piles of armor and equipment discarded by other
adventurers.

Before the Crypt of Souls (G)
  You have reached the back of the graveyard and find a stone crypt. The thick 
stone doors do not appear to have been opened in some time, and all seems to 
go quiet as you examine the entrance more closely. You can not shake the 
feeling that something is watching you. The graveyard is back to the north, 
and the unknown lies through the doors.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3228/4086 MP  2029/2054 mv  881tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 106406 | Before the Crypt of Souls (NS)
>>    Inside the Crypt of Souls (2028)

In the Crypt of Souls (2027)

Before an old stone wall
  Behind the crypt of the graveyard stands a short stone wall that blocks
you from an old, village that must have been destroyed long ago.  You feel
somewhat uneasy, although nothing that you can see suggests danger. 
Peaceful animals and insects are wandering around, light wind shuffles the
grass, but you can feel the area is saturated with something ancient...  And
evil.  

[ Exits: north west ]

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3228/4086 MP  2026/2054 mv  881tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 106406 | Before an old stone wall (NW)
>>    


## You may now use augmentation abilities.

You feel more vulnerable to acid.

You feel more vulnerable to cold.

You feel more vulnerable to electricity.

w
An overgrown stone path
  Trying to cast away your bad feelings, you step into the village,
following an overgrown path.  The path is made of stone slabs which look
unusually new.  To the south the wall of the graveyard grows taller blocking
your pass.  The stone path continues to the north, where you can see the
remnants of houses that were previously dwelled in by the villagers.  One of
such houses lies to the west of you.  

[ Exits: north east west ]
(Red Aura) A fly buzzes annoyingly at your ear.
A lizard tries to hide at your approach.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3308/4086 MP  2053/2054 mv  881tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 106406 | An overgrown stone path (NEW)
>>    
n
An intersection in the village
  This is the center of the village.  The path that has brought you here
goes further to the north, but little branches of it stem to both sides of
the road as well.  To the east you can see the remnants of old houses, left
in shambles.  The road that leads to the west is curved, and you can see it
going to a destroyed building, which looks bigger than any other hut in the
village.  

[ Exits: north east south west ]
     An old, crumbling fountain still has some water bubbling in it.
(Red Aura) A fly buzzes annoyingly at your ear.
(Red Aura) A tiny rat sniffs the air here.
The crazy village elder runs around, jumping in the air and screaming.
The village elder says, "Ah, mighty warrior. Do you wish to return to the
 crypt? I can send you there if you but say the word."

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3308/4086 MP  2052/2054 mv  881tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 106406 | An intersection in the village (NESW)
>>    
w
A small dirt path
  Unlike the slabs that you have seen on the main path, the ones that you are 
walking on right now are really jagged, and it takes some effort not to break
your feet walking on this path. You are so busy with this that you almost 
bump yourself into the wall of the building which stands now to your north.
It is considerably bigger than the other houses, and you conclude that it 
must have been the village store.

[ Exits: (north) east ]

>>    A ruined store

windows are missing all the glass, which lies shattered below your feet.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  3374/4086 MP  2048/2054 mv  881tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 106406 | End of the path (NE)
>>    
n
The village graveyard
  You have arrived at an old graveyard, the long untouched soil suggesting
a lack of recent funerals.  Heavy grave stones, covered with patches of
black, sun-burnt grass, somehow remind you of doors, with keyholes
displaying keys stuck in from the inner sides.  A light wind brings a breath
of fresh forest air from the north, and with it a quiet moan...  As you
stand, deciding whether to proceed any further, the ground at your feet
shakes, and the sound of a turning key chills you to the bone.  

[ Exits: north south west (down) ]
     (Magic) (Glow) (Hum) A bright blue potion has a wolf's head etched on the bottle.

n
The village graveyard
  You have arrived at an old graveyard, the long untouched soil suggesting
a lack of recent funerals.  Heavy grave stones, covered with patches of
black, sun-burnt grass, somehow remind you of doors, with keyholes
displaying keys stuck in from the inner sides.  A light wind brings a breath
of fresh forest air from the north, and with it a quiet moan...  As you
stand, deciding whether to proceed any further, the ground at your feet
shakes, and the sound of a turning key chills you to the bone.

destruction you meet.  The path ahead leads to what looks like the village
graveyard.

>>    The village graveyard

n
A dark hallway in the Necromancers' Guild
  You continue your journey along the halls of the necromancer's guild by
taking the dark hallway leading north.  Suddenly, a cat's scream and a
chicken's yelp coming from the west break the silence.  You stop
immediately, astonished.  Animals, underground?  In the next second another
scream, which did sound like it was produced by a wailing ghost, comes from
the east.  You wonder what is going on around here.

>>    Animal pens
  You walk on hay, which covers the stone floor, and is already beginning
to rot from excess moisture here and there.  A strong, characteristic animal
stench fills your nostrils as you breathe.  It seems as if sunlight fills
the room, but the stone walls and ceiling remind you of your underground
location: you mistook the light provided by a variety of powerful candles
mounted near the top of the room for sunlight.  This calm atmosphere of the
animal pens is broken only by a realization that it is not food the animals
are being grown for ...  

[ Exits: north east west ]
     A wheat seed is waiting to be planted into the rich soil.
The animal keeper is cleaning the pens and feeding the roosters.
A cat, white as a small morning cloud, rubs against your legs.
(Red Aura) A cat, black as only a moonless night can be, rubs against your legs.
(Red Aura) A proud rooster watches you intently.
(Red Aura) A proud rooster watches you intently.

e
A dark hallway in the Necromancers' Guild
  You continue your journey along the halls of the necromancer's guild by
taking the dark hallway leading north.  Suddenly, a cat's scream and a
chicken's yelp coming from the west break the silence.  You stop
immediately, astonished.  Animals, underground?  In the next second another
scream, which did sound like it was produced by a wailing ghost, comes from
the east.  You wonder what is going on around here.  

[ Exits: north east south west ]
(Red Aura) A mortal manifestation of evil, a result of a crazy experiment, the heartless zombie
glares at you.
(Red Aura) A result of a student's experiment, the headless zombie, blindly wanders the halls.

n
>>    A dark hallway in the Necromancers' Guild
  Following the corridor in the guild, you stumble upon an interesting
view: poor zombies, most of them without at least some body parts are
wandering, crawling, sitting around the room.  Taking a closer look, you
realize that they were not damaged by some mighty necromancer, but were just
created to be so.  You realize that they must be the fruits of the students'
experiments.  Classrooms should be nearby.

A dark hallway in the Necromancers' Guild
  The hallway bends, continuing west.  To the north you see a large stone
door, covered with golden statuettes depicting magicians at work.  Below you
notice a dark stone slab, presumably leading to the dungeons of the guild. 
Sounds of peaceful activity reach you from the north, and a chilly wind
reaches from below.  Which path will you take?  

[ Exits: (north) south west (down) ]

>>    Classroom
  A large bright room is lit by artificial light that comes from small
fireballs that are hovering under the ceiling.  There are desks all around
the room, and the professor stands before the students, speaking words of
wisdom.  Each desk, besides a book, and lots of free space, has a rest for a
knife and a goblet.  Your stomach contracts as you realize what those are
used for.  

[ Exits: west ]

(Red Aura) A lazy student is being threatened by her teacher.

>>    A candle-lit hallway
  You walk along a small hallway, the floor, walls and ceiling made of
white stone.  Small candles are mounted on the walls, closely spaced in an
accurate line, providing an artistic play of light and small shadows.  A
narrow red carpet is stretched along the center of the hallway, leading
north.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2031/2054 mv  881tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 106406 | A candle-lit hallway (NS)
>>    
n
A candle-lit hallway
  You have arrived at an intersection of two well-lit hallways.  To the
north lies the council meeting room, east, west and south the hallways
continue.  Bunches of small candles are placed on the corners, gathered in
dozens in large silver candlesticks. In the middle of the room lies a round
red carpet, with narrow straight carpet lines stretching along the hallways.

[ Exits: north east south west ]
(Red Aura) A zombie crawls on the floor with a mop.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3478/3478 HP  4086/4086 MP  2030/2054 mv  881tnl (Reply: Talbor) 
Lv 131  G 106406 | A candle-lit hallway (NESW)
>>    
n
A meeting chamber
  You have arrived at a large round room, the ceiling looming over you in
the form of a huge dome.  The meeting chamber is illuminated by a vast
number of candles mounted all over the walls, high above your reach.  A
massive round marble table sits in the middle of the room, surrounded from
all sides by chairs.  The high council gathers in this meeting room to
discuss matters of huge importance to the necromancers.  

[ Exits: south ]
     (Magic) A massive round table occupies the center of the room.
(Red Aura) A zombie guard raises an eyebrow at you.
(Red Aura) A member of the high council of necromancers is preparing reports.
(Red Aura) A member of the council stands here, discussing important matters.
(Red Aura) A member of the high council of necromancers is preparing reports.

>>    Asardotlan's Room
  Judging by the appearance of the room, its inhabitant is an old and
experienced mage.  Everything looks so much in place and ordered.  Looking
at the desk, you can see ancient books and tomes speaking about the aspects
of advanced necromancy.  Touching one of them, you immediately feel a rush
of evil force going through your whole body.  If only touching them produces
such an effect, what could happen if you read out a few spells from them?!  

[ Exits: north ]
(Red Aura) An old wizard is here to learn some advanced necromancy.

>>    Yerrahar's Room
  The blackened walls and the smell of burning flesh tell you that this
room has seen a lot of fire.  Even now, there is some ash smouldering in the

for the wizard's spells.
